name: Vega Chronicle
summary: A turn-based 4X space strategy game with streamlined logistics. Explore the galaxy and build colonies. Accumulate resources, discover tech, and build a navy to conquer your rivals. Earn bonuses to empower your next play-through with ancestral virtues, and build your legacy among the stars.

name: Versus Umbra
summary: Fight hordes of enemies. Collect Inventium and loot. Craft crazy weapons, impractical armor and improbable gadgets. Level up your character and pick from a wide selection of perks. Level up your weapons and watch them evolve new stronger and stranger features. Complete challenges and achievements to unlock secret weapons and relics. Save the world from an ancient evil. So you know, the usual stuff.

name: Verify: Please Prove That you are Human
summary: This game is a casual checkpoint verification code game, Players can complete 50 levels through prompts, input text, click on blocks, and other verification operations. Nowadays, online verification codes block many robots and humans. If you are a human, please use my verification game.

name: Vector
summary: Vector is an exciting, arcade-style game featuring you as the exceptional free runner who won’t be held down by the system. In this totalitarian world freedom and individually is nothing more than a distant dream. But the heart of a freerunner is strong, and so you break free.

name: Vengeful Guardian: Moonrider
summary: Vengeful Guardian: Moonrider is a side-scrolling action platformer that channels the golden age of classic 16-bit action games in a full-throttle quest for revenge.

name: Vestaria Saga I: War of the Scions
summary: Vestaria Saga is a classically styled Strategy RPG, where positioning, movement, and even weaponry, are paramount to success. Move your heavily armed units around a classic styled grid-based map and engage pirates, rebels, monsters, imperial soldiers, and anyone else that stands in your way.

name: Vermin
summary: A Yoshi must protect six eggs from Fly Guys, Para Troopas, and Boo Buddies.

name: Vehicle No. 4
summary: Vehicle No. 4 is an exciting horde survival game: Build your own combat vehicle, freely place weapons, and upgrade them with modules. Every decision matters as you face waves of enemies. Tinkering meets action – create your ultimate survival vehicle!

name: VectorBall
summary: VectorBall is a multiplayer dodgeball inspired game. Throw balls and move out of the way of incoming balls, this is a fast paced game with easy to understand mechanics. Throw a damage ball to kill another player. If you want to move, throw a teleport ball, or dodge by moving in your play area.

name: Vectronom
summary:
A hypnotic video game about music, geometry and flow.

Vectronom is a music platformer. The game combines challenging platforming with rhythm based gameplay. The architecture of each level changes with the music, players have to memorize patterns and overcome obstacles while dancing through the game world. Unlike other beat matching games where the player has to follow prompts, in Vectronom players have a larger degree of freedom while playing.

name: Vestaria Saga II: The Sacred Sword of Silvanister
summary: Vestaria Saga II continues the adventures of Zade, bringing the tales of him and his companions to a thrilling, satisfying end. They will encounter allies both new and old while uncovering more mysteries behind the vile Margulites and their plan to plunge Vestaria into a new age of darkness.

name: Vermillion Watch: Parisian Pursuit - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you stop a powerful foe from taking over Paris? The collector's edition includes a bonus gameplay chapter, replayable minigames, an ingame strategy guide and other goodies.

name: Vex Mage
summary: Twin elements. Infinite momentum. Danger from every direction. Merge spells, cross dimensions, and dance through deadly arenas in this lightning-fast shooter. Alone or together - Claim your immortality on cross-platform leaderboards. Your name is eternal.

name: Veil of Torment
summary: Enter the abandoned Black Water Asylum in search of a missing girl. Veil of Torment is a psychological horror game where reality twists, shadows whisper, and every step drags you deeper into madness.

name: Vein-X
summary: A crash. Alone in a lab while war rages around you. Explore dark alien dungeons, mine rare minerals, build machines to survive and fight to uncover the truth buried deep below.

name: Veil of Sight
summary: Veil of Sight is a first-person psychological horror game. After disturbing eye experiments, blinking is no longer natural. Explore an abandoned hospital, solve puzzles and survive the doctor who turned your body against you.

name: Vegas Craps by Pokerist
summary: Play real casino craps in 3D and enjoy realistic physics and multiplayer mode. Feel the thrill of competition, immerse yourself in the casino atmosphere and try your luck!

name: Venice Bridges
summary:
Venice is under attack by malicious Plague Doctors and you have been chosen to come to its rescue.
Plunge into the world of Venice Bridges, a 3D puzzle adventure game where the beauty of Venice meets hardship and destruction.
Save Venice by luring the Plague Doctors and their squad to their demise, and solve puzzles to restore Venice to its glory.

name: Vetrix Worlds
summary: The critically acclaimed Tetris-inspired VR Puzzle game is back with a feature-packed sequel! Enjoy the game alone with our Arcade and Campaign modes, or get social with our all-new Co-op and Competitive Multiplayer Online modes. Time to scratch that OCD itch of yours!

name: Vector Seven
summary: Retro arcade shooter inspired by classic 80's games Fast-paced side-scrolling shoot 'em up with looping battlefields, relentless enemy waves, tactical shields, power-ups and hyperspace jumps

name: Vermeer's Twilight
summary:
A historically rich and emotionally immersive Game Boy adventure.

Vermeer's Twilight is an intimate and atmospheric journey into the mind of the painter Johannes Vermeer, set in the final years of his life. As the world around him changes and the golden age of Dutch art fades into uncertainty, the painter wanders through his home and the streets of Delft, reliving his greatest works and confronting the struggles of a life devoted to art.

Explore the house and the city, uncover forgotten memories, and collect the paintings that define an era.

Will Vermeer find meaning in the fading light, or will it vanish like the colors on his empty canvas?

name: VectaGuard: Zero
summary: Arcade-inspired shmup action where neon vector caverns explode with modern visuals, dynamic music, weapon upgrades and intense score chasing.

name: Vespia: Shield of Aberration
summary: Vespia: Shield of Aberration is a strategic tower-defense game where you combine spells to create the most powerful wizards. Blending rogue-like and deck-building mechanics, you’ll upgrade your wizards, unlock new spells, and recruit allies to defend the city from impending doom!

name: Vertical Shift
summary:
A VR Esport unlike any other. Fly through the arenas equipped with your Zenith Suit, an advanced movement system. Your Zenith Suit is equipped with Grapple Hooks, Jet Packs, and Gliders, giving you ultimate control over your flight.

Vertical Shift also features a single-player campaign! Explore the City of Orion, a futuristic metropolis on the brink of collapse. Join the resistance and help take down the evil government through a variety of missions and activities. Or just swing around and take in the sights!

name: Venus Vacation Prism: Dead or Alive Xtreme
summary:
On this island, the moment of love.

The first ever full-fledged first-person adventure romance game in the DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme series, offering romantic encounters with six cute, charming girls!

name: Vega Conflict: Bastion Cruiser Pack
summary: The formidable Bastion Cruiser hulls boast built-in Counter-Chain and the Firestorm Overdrive which unleashes devastating damage when your shields drop.

name: Veil of Ashes
summary: Conquer the battlefield in this real-time tactics wargame within a dark setting. Command infantry, steam-powered tanks and colossal behemoths of three unique factions across destructible terrain. Assemble your army from a variety of units and experience immersive single- and multiplayer battles.

name: Versus Vampire
summary: Take part in the eternal battle between Vampires and Humans. Choose your camp and fight in this new online multiplayer action game.

name: Vectrexagon
summary:
A new game for the classic Vectrex console for 2016! Avoid hitting the walls while the difficulty increases, with everyhing moving faster and faster in beat to the pumping soundtrack.

Programmed by Andreas Gustafsson, music by Yerzmyey (of AY-Riders), and based off a game concept by Terry Cavanagh.

This is the 'unlimited' release of Vectrexagon, which will be made as long as there is demand for the game (meaning it will be made for a long time).

Note: Each game comes with a unique number on the inside of the box cover, indicating which manufactured game the purchaser has bought, as the games are made. The number shows how many have sold so far, and which one was purchased.

name: Velhodium Isle
summary: Velhodium Isle is a pixel-art boomer shooter in which you fight monsters in themed locations. Use weapons and magic to get through crowds of monsters and close the source of apocalyptic terrors. Disable shields, close the anomaly, and survive the brutal slaughter!

name: Vespera
summary: Vespera is an online co-op game. Play as relic hunters, solving enigmatic mysteries and escaping a terrifying monster. Will you dare to face the darkness to find the cursed relics?

name: VergeWorld
summary: Fly, crash, and adapt in this post-apocalyptic high-speed combat racing roguelite. VergeWorld mixes procedurally generated intense action and airship customization with the retro PSX-era 3D visuals and synthwave music.

name: Vessels of Decay
summary: Civilization has ended, and creatures older than man are slowly taking back the lands which once belonged to them. Follow Mud as she ventures further into the decaying lands and ruins of an overgrown Scandinavia, where civilization ended in mysterious circumstances centuries ago.

name: Vendetta
summary:
The gameplay could be compared with the Last Ninja series. It has an isometric view and is flick screen. You can pick up useful items like weapons (knives, and guns), which blink when you enter a screen containing such an item, as well as the evidence needed to complete each stage. Any collected evidence is shown on a camera film reel.

Once all the evidence is collected on a stage then the game changes to a driving game where you have to get to the next stage. The car is viewed from behind and you must avoid the other vehicles as well as helicopters dropping bombs but your car is armed with a cannon and missiles. Police cars have to be avoided or they will ask to see any evidence you have.

name: Velcira Chronicles: The Veil of Alba
summary: Velcira Chronicles: The Veil of Alba is an Action-adventure 3D game focused on exploration, horror elements, combat and puzzle solving.

name: Velo
summary:
Velo is a unique cycling game that combines the thrill of virtual cycling with an engaging story-driven experience.

⚠ Velo requires a physical exercise bicycle connected via Bluetooth to play! ⚠

name: Vereda
summary: Vereda is a 3d escape room puzzle adventure. Play as a secret agent assigned a mission to recover a secret dossier set in an unusual town. Explore areas and take in your surroundings. Use all of your puzzle solving skills to make your way through the town and recover the missing dossier.

name: Velocity 2X: Critical Mass Edition
summary:
Velocity 2X: Critical Mass Edition for PlayStation 4 and Vita features an exclusive making-of documentary and all three expansions: 'Daily Sprint', 'Critical Urgency' and 'Dual Core' on the disc for a total of 66 levels of platforming & shooter fun!

The physical release for PlayStation 4 included exclusive extras with the Official Soundtrack CD by Joris de Man (the composer of the OST of Horizon: Zero Dawn) and an exclusive Studio Booklet focusing on the inspirations behind the creation of the game.

name: Vestige of the Past
summary:
Vestige of the Past is a an open world game in which you are exploring an immersive world of alternative presence and trying to survive in an almost familiar but oddly different place. What is behind that contrast between what your eyes are telling you and your gut feeling? Well you will have more pressing matters to worry about at the beginning.

First you will need to learn how to survive and make decisions that you might not be proud of. Or perhaps you will take such decisions you won’t need to be secretive about. It’s all up to you. Either way, you will be the one who will have to deal with the consequences.

name: Vertical Strike Endless Challenge
summary: A flight-based action game designed to be easy to pick up and enjoy right away, and be playable over short timeframes. Make use of a range of weapons and achieve dangerously high levels of mobility by disabling your Alpha Limiter to spear your way through waves of enemy attacks.

name: Velvet Guard
summary: You got one bullet, fire it wisely as one mistake may cause you death in this fast paced game. Choose from a selection of abilities to survive in difficult situations and master them to become the champion of the Velvet Guard.

name: Vector's Adventures
summary: The blueprints are scattered and out of order! You must piece the worlds back together. Join Vector, a dot, the lowest form of geometry, in his adventure across the Shades of Blue as he battles a hierarchy of greater shapes. Wield the Architect's pen for puzzles and combat in the Land of Lines.

name: Venice
summary: Venice is sinking and only you can save it! From the floating fortress of your golden gondola, you'll restore the city by returning its lost treasures. Sling costly coins, launch lovely lyres and ricochet ruby rings into the corresponding spaces overhead. Use your arsenal of special shots to create cascading combos and earn bonus points along the way. But beware shelves, chutes, swirlies and other traps will make things tricky, so you'll need power-ups like Wild Shot and Wings to help you sail through the levels. So grab your gondola and get ready with a majestic soundtrack, gloriously ornate artwork and four enduring game modes, Venice is a classic test of wits, will and skill.

name: Vestige
summary: Vestige is a room-scale VR documentary that uses volumetric capture to take the viewer on a journey into the mind of Lisa as she remembers her lost love. Within an empty void, fragments of past memories appear of their life together and eventually lead us to the shocking moment of Erik’s death.

name: Vendetta Online
summary: Vendetta Online is a 3D space combat MMORPG for Windows, Mac, Linux, Android and iOS, as well as the Oculus Rift. This MMO permits thousands of players to interact as the pilots of spaceships in a vast universe. Users may build their characters in any direction they desire, becoming rich captains of industry, military heroes, or outlaws. A fast-paced, realtime "twitch" style combat model gives intense action, coupled with the backdrop of RPG gameplay in a massive online galaxy. Three major player factions form a delicate balance of power, with several NPC sub-factions creating situations of economic struggle, political intrigue and conflict. The completely persistent universe and detailed storyline add to the depth of immersion, resulting in a unique online experience.

name: Venator
summary: The von Penumbrus are famous parapsychological hunters fighting mummies, vampires, ghosts, werewolves, ... since several generations. But... the youngest member of the family, Gilbert, is not really a promising hunter. He is rather lazy, determinedly peaceful, not really very bright... and after some painful training sessions, this is the night of his first hunt.

name: Vesper.5
summary: In this game, you may take one step each day, and then you must wait for the next day. If you wish to complete the game, you will have to make it a part of your life for at least 100 days. Make a ritual out of it. How will you incorporate it into your daily schedule? Will you tie it to an existing activity? Will you treat it as a ritual or merely a routine? Will you add to the ritual, embellishing it in your own way, making it yours? Meditate, say a prayer, think back over what has happened while you have been playing? Will you approach it alone or share it with another?

name: VeilWood
summary: Protect your farm from twisted creatures, explore new areas, and put an end to the Azure Haze in this first person real time strategy dark farming sim.

name: Vesp: a History of Sapphic Scaphism
summary: This is a vespo-sapphic pesticidepunk UV romance thriller

name: Vex 3
summary: Vex 3 is a challenging platform adventure game. Make your way from one platform to the other and avoid deadly obstacles such as buzzsaws, spikes, crumbling blocks, and more! Run and jump to reach the flags. These are the checkpoints.

name: Vermin
summary: Game and Watch game from the original 1980 Silver series.

name: Version -1: Where Love Lies
summary:
A prequel side story to Pokémon Rejuvenation, Where Love Lies tells the story of Keta and Taelia, presented in a short package of four chapters with two endings. It contains most of Rejuvenation's mechanics, based on Generation VII.

Where Love Lies eschews the traditional Pokémon formula, with no Pokédex, Gym battles or Pokémon catching. Instead, adding Pokémon to your party must be done through story progression or by finding them in secret locations.

name: Veronica's Body
summary: How will your deepest desires change you again? Veronica's Body is all about erotic transformation and corruption fetish combat that flawlessly blends RPG style combat and kink in order to tackle titillating bosses and solve sultry secrets.

name: Vegas Tales
summary: A wealthy resort owner is dying and needs you to help him decide who should inherit his estate. You'll be interviewing some over-the-top characters and helping decide which of them most deserves to become extremely wealthy. Be careful, as there may be more to some than meets the eye.

name: Vector City Racers
summary: Browser based racing MMO powered by Adobe Flash. Players could design and upgrade their own cars, race against other players, and explore 13 regions of Vector City. Subscription memberships expanded the number of playable areas and enabled garage customization.

name: Veredilia: The Sacred Forest
summary: Veredilia: The Sacred Forest is a 2D platforming game that takes inspiration from classic platformers such as Sonic, and fighting games like Mortal Kombat. The game aims to be a combination of classic 2D platforming with 1v1 fighting whilst also exploring the large forest of Veredilia across various locales with a wide range of characters, technical movesets, and flashy combos. You can take control of one of 3 characters, each with their own special moves, combos, and super moves. Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and kick, punch, and slash your way to victory, before it's too late. Do you have what it takes?

name: Versus: The Lost Ones
summary: Steal alien powers and absorb their memories! Can you outlast your opponents to escape from planet Versus? An epic adventure in a new galaxy.

name: Verse Surf
summary: Whether you're a 60s rolling stone, a 70s disco queen, an 80s big hair rocker or you're just a walking music database, prove your skills and steal the scene in this party game.

name: Vectorio
summary: Vectorio is a simple survival base-building game where the objective is to claim resources you find around the map and use them to research new powerful weapons and technology.

name: Vector Rider
summary: Race at high speed in a dynamic world where you create the track as you go. Build platforms, glide, dodge hazards, and master skill-based routes in a futuristic racing playground.

name: Venetian Blinds
summary:
As the name implies the Venetian Blinds demo isn't a game, but a demo that simulates a pair of Venetian blinds! The joystick can be used to raise and lower the blinds by pushing up or down. When the blinds are raised a nicely done sunset is visible out the window. The story behind the Venetian Blind demo is rather interesting.

It was not released publicly until 2003, as part of Activision Anthology for Windows, macOS, and Game Boy Advance. It was later released in 2010 through the Game Room retrogaming service for Windows, Xbox 360, and Windows Phone 7.

As most people know, Activision was founded by several ex-Atari employees who had left due to Atari's policies on programmer recognition (or the lack thereof). One of these employees was Bob Whitehead, creator of the "Venetian Blinds" technique, which was first used in Atari's Video Chess to display eight objects in a row instead of the normal six. Even though Activision had never used the Venetian Blinds technique in any of their games, that didn't stop Atari from threatening to sue Activision for "stealing" the technique along with other various proprietary information. Since Activision knew that they hadn't stolen anything from Atari, they decided to play a little joke on Atari. According to David Crane, when the Atari's lawyers questioned them about the "stolen" Venetian Blinds technique David showed them this demo and said "Is this what you guys are referring to?". Apparently Atari wasn’t in a laughing mood, and they went through with the lawsuit. In the end Atari ended up losing the case and Activision went on to become the most successful of the 2600 third party companies.

Although Activision never made a game out of this demo it didn't go completely to waste. The sunset was later used in the background of Barnstorming.

name: Venison County
summary: Grab your sawed-off, cast some sigils, and face the never ending nightmare head on in Venison County. Blast your old neighbors into undead venison giblets, master weapon specific active reloads, and limitlessly combine slain cultists' sigils for their sinful buffs (if you can withstand God's wrath).

name: Vector 36
summary: Engineered for failure or victory, your customization and piloting skills are the keys to your success in Vector 36. Race across the terraformed surface of Mars in a completely customizable skimmer built to suit your piloting preference.

name: Vermis
summary: text based fan game based off the artist Plastiboo's art book.

name: Veil of Madness
summary: Veil of Madness is a Lovecraftian Deck Builder game that merges the strategic charm of a deck builder with the immersive experience of a first-person RPG genre. Unravel eldritch secrets, battle insanity, and shape your destiny in this chilling journey.

name: Velone
summary:
Velone is a creative automation game inspired by the classic Opus Magnum.

On the mysterious planet Velone, aliens have tasked you with saving their dying home. A collision with an asteroid has disrupted the entire energy supply. Now it is your job to build and program hydraulic mechanisms that create and place valuable Velone stones, restoring power to a civilization in peril.

Use logical thinking to solve difficult mechanical puzzles and come up with new and creative ways to program the Velone stones and beat every level. Enjoy the endorphin rush when constructs execute your plan flawlessly and everything slots into place in one fluid series of motions.

Each solved level rewards you with new information about the planet Velone, its climate, population, technology, society and more.

name: Velociblaster
summary: EVOLUTION. TAKES. FLIGHT. Become a dinosaur and blast away your enemies with high-tech blaster cannons! Engage in multiplayer PvP aerial combat using rocket thrusters to fly. Outmaneuver and outwit your velociraptor rivals in intense, fast-paced battles.

name: Velocity Riders
summary: Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping 3D bike racing adventure! Zoom through stunning environments with ultra-realistic graphics and smooth controls.

name: Venom/Spider-Man: Separation Anxiety
summary:
Separation Anxiety is a side scrolling beat'em up game, featuring characters and stories taken from the Spiderman comics. The story is loosely based on a mini series of comics about Venom. In this game, the player(s) gets to choose between controlling Spider-Man, or his on and off again foe Venom. As Spiderman you must stop the life foundation who have removed five symbiotes from Venom. They plan to bond them with their soldiers, creating a dangerous army. Venom recovering from his wounds also realises he must destroy them.

The game lets you punch, kick, swing and do combos throughout streets, the woods and underground complexes towards your goal. Throughout the game the player can pick up superhero icons. This icons will help you by summoning help from some of Spiderman's greatest allies like Daredevil, Ghost Rider, Hawkeye and Captain America

name: Vega Conflict: Cavalier Cutter Pack
summary: The swiftest Altairian hull, the Cavalier Cutters are the ultimate defence against stasis, their Catalyst Overdrive converting stasis energy into shield defense and speed.

name: Very Scary Backrooms Game
summary: You have no weapons. You have no means of defending yourself. Some will chase you, some will outsmart you. If you are in danger, run and hide.

name: Vesper's Hunt
summary: A turn-based deduction game where you play as a detective hunting vampires. Use a mirror to reveal hidden beasts and holy water to strike them down. But beware—the undead grow stronger with every attack. Outsmart the vampires… or become their next victim!

name: Veil Stream
summary: Play as a livestreamer exploring a snowy forest to capture supernatural events on camera. Manage stamina, hunger, and motivation while risking everything for views. The closer and longer you film, the more you earn. Upload videos, buy gear, and survive in this unique horror survival experience.

name: Verlet Swing
summary: Verlet Swing brings you energetic swinging in a world that would be best described as a fever dream. Swing fast, don't crash and reach the goal as fast as possible!

name: Vegas Stakes
summary: Vegas Stakes is a casino simulation game, and a port of the game with the same name for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System.

name: Veecaloid Pop
summary: The object of Veecaloid is to gather various objects littered across the screen, themed to either a Magical Girl or pop idol. The main character is a vocaloid based on (and voiced by) voice actress/singer Cristina Vee.

name: Veterans Online
summary: Praise the Veterans, a fresh Free to Play Top-down Shooter, for those who enjoy simple, yet tactical multiplayer battles.

name: Vecter
summary: Vecter is a fast-paced runner (and at some point shooter) game where your goal is to survive by the skin of your teeth. You get in your ship, you push the throttle on max, rip it out of the console and then try to survive for as long as possible.

name: Vera Blanc: Full Moon
summary: Vera Blanc is a mystery / detective game. Take on the role of Vera Blanc, a young and beautiful woman with an extraordinary power: the ability to read other people's minds! The game plays like a visual novel / adventure game with two endings for the mystery and a collection of challenging minigames.

name: Vestaria Saga Gaiden: Heroes of Lucca
summary: Vestaria Saga Gaiden: Heroes of Lucca is a 4 chapter side game in the Vestaria Saga series that was released alongside Vestaria Saga Gaiden: the Sacred Sword of Silvanister (later localized as Vestaria Saga II).

name: Velvet Bite: Softly, With Teeth
summary: You've been invited to a Halloween party! Yay! Music! Food! Drinks! Vampires! Wait. VAMPIRES!? Velvet Bite: Softly, With Teeth is a Romantic Visual Novel featuring 6 romanceable vampires.

name: Vessel
summary: A fast-paced 1v1 sci-fi brawler where pilots clash in fully customizable mechs. Shred armor, adapt your tactics, and outfight your opponent in visceral, high-stakes combat.

name: Vengeance
summary: Face endless waves. Dodge. Survive. Repeat. Vengeance is a fast-paced 2D bullet hell roguelike where you're thrown into a chaotic battlefield swarming with enemies. Master your movement, survive as long as you can. Every second counts, and one wrong step means game over.

name: Vermin Control
summary: In Vermin Control, you will enter a thrilling sci-fi tower defense world filled with strategic combat and high tension. Operate a versatile unit capable of both melee combat and construction, deploy and manage 9 unique devices, and protect key facilities from relentless vermin assaults.

name: Velocirambo
summary: Have you ever wanted to be a dinosaur with a gun? Now is your chance to make that weird dream a reality!

name: Versus: The Elite Trials
summary: Will you infiltrate the gods' Elite Courte, stealing their superpowers, or turn double agent and join them, taking your place among the divine?

name: Verlet Ascend
summary: Verlet Ascend is a physics based, action platformer with roguelike mechanics, a fully destructable procedurally generated environment, and rope swing physics. Fight creatures, loot enemies, upgrade your character, and climb your way up in an endless parkour.

name: VenusBlood Ragnarok International
summary: VenusBlood Ragnarok is a direct sequel to the world-famous VenusBlood FRONTIER! Enjoy the combination of deep tactical gameplay with a rich narrative set around Norse mythology!

name: Venomous
summary: Venomous is a 2D action-adventure game where you play as a skilled hero wielding web-slinging, slashing, and shuriken abilities to explore handcrafted levels, defeat unique enemies, and conquer epic boss battles.

name: Velocity Rush
summary: Velocity Rush is a fast-paced racing game with breathtaking speeds and a stylish visual design. Challenge yourself by competing against smart opponents, choose one of six unique cars and start your ride filled with vibrant colors and adrenaline.

name: Vectoroids
summary: Blast your way through waves of asteroids and UFOs in Classic Mode. Or play as a team with up to 4 Players in Co-Op Mode. Battle your Friends in Deathmatch and Last Man Standing on 5 different Battle Maps!

name: Vellum
summary: Dive into magic tomes to discover pages of increasing power, sling ink-infused spells, and choose how your foes evolve - as a group or solo!

name: Verne: The Shape of Fantasy
summary: Verne: The Shape of Fantasy is a pixel art narrative experience based on the life and works of Jules Verne, which merges exploration, puzzles and interactive dialogues with the imagery of one of the most famous science fiction and adventure writers.

name: Very Very Valet
summary:
1 to 4 players control an "elite" team of puppet valets, working together to overcome any and all valet related challenges. It's going to take teamwork and a certain "just park it anywhere" mentality to save the world from a severe parking crisis! It's not enough to just be a valet - be a VERY VERY VALET.

Madcap Couch Co-op

Valet alone or with friends! Up to four players can work together to solve this severe parking shortage. Help each other and hitch a ride, or cause chaos launching your fellow valets wildly - the choice is yours!

name: Verses
summary: In Verses, you play as Eca: a data analyst working in a laboratory on the coast of far-future Romania. The land around you is grey and dead, the residents sickened and mutated by the poisonous soil or swept up into endless war. But your job is not to save the world — rather to understand it, digging deeply into the meaning of objects, organisms, and poems. Keep your mind clear and open. Be a conduit. Stay hungry.

name: Vedelem: The Golden Horde
summary: Vedelem: The Golden Horde is a medieval Real Time Strategy and Survival game set in the 13th century. Build, expand and defend your lands against the deadliest Mongolian invasion ever witnessed. They will seek to destroy your walls and salt your earth. Will you survive the Golden Horde?

name: Veilwalkers
summary: Dungeon. Horror. Survival. Veilwalkers plunges you into a terrifying world of dungeon exploration: find loot, outsmart monsters, and uncover hidden artifacts for a shadowy government agency. Build your deck, use your items wisely, and escape before time runs out. Your survival depends on it.

name: Vesper
summary: Enter Vesper, a growing library of unique narrative games made by your favorite creators — inspired by classic TTRPGs. Come explore wonderful new worlds with us. Who knows what you’ll find?

name: Velocity Rift
summary: Take part in three unique modes, each of which will require your maximum concentration and skill. Beautiful stylized graphics immerse you in the atmosphere of an exotic racing island, where every track is a challenge.

name: Vessels
summary: Vessels is an atmospheric, character-driven narrative adventure game. Players assume the role of crewmember quarantined in the airlock of their ship with no memory of how they got there, and with crewmates who refuse to let you out. Players can posses other crew members to explore the ship and find a way to free yourself, where different choices can lead to multiple endings.

name: Veylora
summary: You play as Mike Harvey, a local investigator searching for answers behind multiple missing persons cases. The trail leads into a forest — but it doesn’t end there. Taken by unknown creatures, you awaken inside a strange house. The shadows are watching. Escape is not guaranteed.

name: Verbal Beatdown
summary: Type words to battle enemy books in this fast-paced spelling game! Unlock characters and perks to explore new strategies!

name: Vertex
summary: Coming end 2026!

name: VeloCity
summary: Compete in the heart of VeloCity, where skill meets skates hits your face. In this race for dominance, momentum is power, and flair wins fights. Engage in trick-fueled combat to knock out your rivals and take control of the city, one district at a time. Skate fast. Kick ass!

name: Vector the Crocodile in Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: This is a hack which replaces the main character with Vector the Crocodile in the original Sonic the Hedgehog for Sega Genesis. Vector the Crocodile is a character first playable in Knuckles Chaotix and later playable in Sonic Heroes. His abilities are based on those found in Knuckles Chaotix. Moves include a spindash, air dash, and wall climb. The move list can be found in the readme. As in Chaotix Vector has reduced jump height and acceleration, making Vectors air dash move all the more valuable.

name: Venture to the Vile
summary: Your life is plunged into disarray by a monstrous entity known as “the Vile”. With the town in shambles and your arm left blackened by the Vile, you discover that your best friend, Luella, is also missing. Will you save the town and find Luella — or will you give in to the monster you've become?

name: Versalis
summary: A fast-paced, grid-based, card-flipping tactical CCG for up to 4 players! Archetypes and team Dynamics bring powerful abilities to move, defend, swap, or reorient cards. Capture the board and flip your way to victory!

name: Vector Horizon
summary: Take flight in Vector Horizon where you guide a thruster-powered car through wild obstacle courses built for timing, precision, and control. Vector Horizon is all about the joy of movement and the thrill of pulling it off.

name: Veiled Basilisk
summary: Experience a thrilling ride as you unravel a twisted and branching tale of a science experiment gone wrong in this Sci-fi action FPS game! Early Access version available!

name: Velocity High Speed
summary: Velocity High Speed is a fast paced action game mixing platformer, third person shooter and racing. Inspired by Sonic, Klonoa and Trackmania, this game will make you travel accross levels at full speed and challenge you by combining your platform and shooting skills.

name: Vehicle Beat Zombie
summary: Zombie incoming,fortunately,we got plenty of vehicle to use,armed with multiple weapons,avoid attacked by zombie by driving vehicles,open landscape give you advantage to take vantage point,use weapons to hit them,grenades ,firegrenade are handy,you can upgrade weapons to gain more chance to win.

name: Verdant Idea
summary:
Minecraft 1.20.1 Modpack.

The world as you know is gone. Your task is to bring it back to life!

Inspired by Regrowth, Verdant Idea is a unique experience in which you start in a vast, empty world and eventually build a thriving civilization using magic and technology.

While this modpack takes inspiration from Regrowth, treat it as a spiritual successor - there are many exiting changes and additions!

name: Velocity One
summary: Velocity One is a Futuristic Track Challenge game that resembles your favorite mid-to-late 90s futuristic racing games, but with stunning, modern atmospheric environments and a truly terrifying amount of loops and inversions. And this time... you are not magnetized to the track.

name: Vertebreaker
summary: A new game by the creators of Sonic Mania.

name: Veins Like Tapeworms
summary: Who needs a moral compass when you have a god in the gutter?

name: Vehicle Construction Kit
summary: Vehicle Construction Kit is a vehicle building sandbox game that allows building vehicles and other complex machinery from a collection of simple base parts alone or together in multiplayer.

name: Ved: Journey Beyond the Cube
summary: Ved is trapped in a strange world, transformed into a cube. Solve puzzles, unlock hidden powers, and explore a shifting reality to find a way back home.

name: Veritas
summary: Veritas is a game of mystery and discovery from Glitch Games, creators of the Forever Lost trilogy, that poses the question; what is truth, and does it even matter?

name: Venus Eleven Vivid!
summary:
The pinnacle of beautiful girls × soccer × simulation!
This isn’t just a typical beautiful girl game, it’s seriously about soccer!

This is a 2D Japanese gacha sports simulation game where you manage a soccer team of girls from diverse backgrounds and worlds by improving their skills. Each of them is competent in specific positions, some can only be goalkeeper, attacker, defender, midfielder and some can have multiple positions. The manager will have to choose the formation of his team. Also some girls have special skill allowing them to counter the ball or opposing players. During breaks, the manager can treat his players when they are exhausted or switch places to those who are not playing on the field. The soccer gameplay is focused on the choice of action to be carried out for the player currently having the ball or being close to the opposing player having it. There are visual novel like stories about World Cup and personal characters stories. Each character is voiced to.

name: Ved: Recure
summary: Ved: Recure is a fast-paced action roguelite where you play as an adult trapped in the 1000th game you bought but never played. You’ll wield fully customizable buff chains to face off against formidable foes and strategic builds to conquer this 1000th game and make your way back to reality.

name: Velocity Racing: 1000
summary: A sleek, customizable arcade-style racer built by a solo developer. Unlock 21+ cars, race across 5 detailed maps, tweak every setting, and compete solo or in co-op via Steam lobbies.

name: Velana Adventures: Chapter I
summary: A short Tactical RPG adventure in the Velana world. A gaiden, or side story game, to the main War of Velana series.

name: VectroMirror
summary: You are the Test Subject. Your goal: Obtain human-level emotional awareness. Parkour your way through the increasingly difficult "Vectormirror" simulation and achieve sentience...by any means necessary. Play a sci-fi platformer unlike any other.

name: Vera Jones
summary: Play as the young adventurer Vera Jones and uncover the mysteries of an ancient civilization whose legacy threatens the entire human race.

name: Vertigo Racing
summary: A driving game from Deep Byte Studios.

name: Vertical Dash
summary:
Ever wanted a game where you just have addictive fun? Well, here it is, it doesn't matter what you are doing, this game perfectly fits the time passer's description, waiting for a friend? Playing this game will make sure that time will be used for your daily android fun! 
 
 
Simple - Tap to jump, tap to dash to shown side, simple as that, yet effective!

name: Vegetables of Mass Destruction
summary: An action hack 'n' slash roguelite where you play as a feisty raccoon tasked with saving the farm animals from evil robots by his master, Sensei Cow. Use the destructive power of vegetables and team up with your trusty chicken and pig pals to rescue farm animals and destroy the robot invaders!

name: Veinrider
summary: Veinrider is a short incremental game about traversing alien caves and escaping a strange planet.

name: Vendigo Corporation
summary: Vendigo Corporation - is an atmospheric first-person psychological horror game. You must escape from the underground complex where experiments have gone out of control.

name: Velocibox
summary: Velocibox is a twitch-heavy, endless runner made for a hardcore audience.

name: Veilfall: True Strength
summary: A story-driven fantasy turn-based strategy rpg where players mix-and-match skills, carefully balance their equipment, and manage character deployment to minimize Fatigue.

name: Vektor Wars
summary: A first-person cyber shooter tribute to classic Arcade blasters such as Battlezone, Berzerk & Robotron. All rendered in '80s 3D Vector-Vision' (TM).

name: Vending Machine Business Simulator
summary: Build your business! control every aspect of a thriving vending machine business. Buy, place, and restock machines to increase profits. Do you have what it takes to manage, expand, and dominate the vending industry?

name: Versus Net Soccer
summary: 28 different national teams are selectable in this soccer game. You can select from two 3-D views: half-top view or side view. When two monitors are used, one screen can be in half-top and the other in side view during the game. (Sinopsys from Arcade Database)

name: VenusBlood Hollow International
summary: War hangs like the sword of Damocles over Helvetia, a land ruled by four Dark Lords. In this age of blood and strife, Leonhardt Arknoah, a war hero and leader of the Varganian Empire's secret task force, steps onto the battlefield once more, the flames of ambition burning brightly within him.

name: Vegemancer
summary: Feed a mysterious mole your hard grown vegetables in this fast-paced incremental farming clicker/idle. Use tools, automation and chaotic spells to truly master the vegetable and unravel reality altogether.

name: Ven VR Adventure
summary: Ven VR Adventure is a single-player VR platform game. You happen to meet Ven on his unknown planet, invaded by Bruce Nelson, who wants to destroy the magical world.

name: Ven Games
summary: Classic party games of drawing, guessing and word play! Browser based and make for all platforms.

name: Venice 2089
summary:
The city of Venice, once a significant tourism destination but now almost uninhabited, is struggling with the unpredictable behaviour of tides. Some of the most important monuments are being taken away, among the complaints of the citizens, and the lower part of the city becomes inaccessible more often than not.

In Venice 2089, you'll explore the city through the eyes of Nova, a bored teenager who has currently no clue about what to do in life and just wants to relax from the stress of their usual routine.

name: Veil of Secrets
summary: Veil of Secrets is the first and only book of the Veil of Secrets series.

name: Verdant Village
summary: Verdant Village is a fantasy life simulation game. Explore the massive Empyrean Vale. There are crops to tend, ore to mine, fish to catch, and secrets to discover. Meet the townsfolk and start a life. Live the way you want, build a thriving farm, or set your own goals, the decision is yours!

name: Venus & Braves: Majo to Megami to Horobi no Yogen
summary: Venus & Braves: Majo to Megami to Horobi no Yogen is a tactical role-playing game developed by Namco for the PlayStation 2. A pseudo-sequel to the 2-dimensional RPG Seven: Cavalry Troop of Molmorth, it takes place in the same fantasy world.

name: Vertigrowl
summary: A programming workplace horror comedy. Ascend through an eldritch tower. Input your movements ahead. Dodge unknown entities. Complain in the private chat. Get back to work.

name: Verbena: Tales of Growing Up
summary: After a classmate’s murder, you and five love interests must decide—will your final year of high school be a search for the truth or a story of love?

name: Vengeance Hunters
summary:
Vengeance Hunters is an adrenaline fueled Neo-Geo hardware developed beat’em’up that lets you and a friend in local co-op fight mutants, zombies, punks, gangsters, lab techs with bombs (you read that correctly), suited mystery men, cyborgs and more across multiple stages, sub-levels and secret areas.

You'll be focused on fast and frantic action, combos and even a small bit of story. Vengeance Hunters features an amazing OST as well as incredible pixel art. Combat isn't the standard era combat that you've seen over and over since the 90's. Each playable character has their own Signature Move and style that will greatly change how you play.

name: Veil of Shadows
summary: Veil of Shadows is an action-adventure with roguelite elements, echoing the vibes of classics from the past. Explore the surroundings to understand what's happening to Sirene. With the essence of retro games, face monsters, complete quests to gain experience, and evolve, preparing for the journey.

name: Venkazoid Blast
summary: You are Vakimoh. They are the Venkazoids. Fight for your life in this quick and brutal arcade-style shooter. Can you escape your cage?

name: Vega Conflict: Paladin Pack
summary: As the flagship of the AXIS Project, the Paladin Carrier is a perfect combination of offensive firepower and dynamic support, featuring an interchangeable Support Field and Harmonic Fleet wide bonuses.

name: Vertigo!
summary: Ready for a sensational and unforgettable experience? Fly through the skyscrapers of a city almost 8 km2 big in total freedom, take advantage of the wind tunnels to gain speed and tackle the steepest routes. You will make breathtaking routines, experimenting acrophobia, free fall and much more!

name: Verdant
summary: Accompany Sprout on his journey through the green post-apocalyptic world of Verdant. Survive the beautiful yet harsh environment by building camps and upgrading your gear. Balance life and death literally in your hand with your powers and uncover their connection to the downfall of humanity.

name: Vellum Quest: Kami no Zanshi
summary: This game is RPG where the world is composed of a “single screen” modeled after parchment. There are no map transitions, and all events progress continuously.

name: Versus Tactics
summary: Versus Tactics is a 1v1 turn-based competitive battle game inspired by the classic Final Fantasy Tactics. Manage your levels, characters and summon to outsmart and overpower your opponents. Become the battlefield's ultimate tactician!

name: Veteran Combat
summary: Veteran Combat is a 2D side-scrolling (arcade) fighting game for PC.

name: Veronica
summary: 'Veronica' is a first person psychological horror game based on the events that occur after your movie is interrupted by an alert due to sighting reports of a 7 year old girl, Veronica, who went missing 3 years ago. Why does it seem like you know more about it than you're sharing?

name: Venge
summary: In an effort to win some money, you decide to explore a once magnificent movie studio that vanished into thin air a few years back. After a terrible fall, you find yourself trapped in the abandoned world of Rotnic Entertainment. Suddenly, you wake the spirits and get transported to THEIR world...

name: Verlore Drome van Slange Bundle
summary: 3 vastly different worlds, 3 mystifyingly varied experiences and 3 completely different types of challenges. Are ready to take on this gargantuan challenge and put yourself to the ultimate test. From traveling mysterious realms, exploring dreams and solving other-worldly puzzles to taking on an arena of mutant creatures and becoming the ultimate warrior in a game show to the death. This package is sure to put all of your skills to the test!

name: Veil of the Soulstones
summary: Brave the Veil of the Soulstones alone or with your friends in this brutal, real-time auto battler adventure. Loot weapons and armor from every foe to build your strength, and through powerful synergies, slay the creatures that lurk unseen in the shadows.

name: Venus: Build Your Destiny
summary: Venus is a sandbox action-adventure merging RPG progression with creative engineering, physics-based construction, and high-stakes exploration. Build machines for mining, shape a utopian cloud city, and wield advanced weapons to face the threat below.

name: Very Unserious Game
summary:
Very Unserious Game is a short narrative game (approximately twenty minutes), playable only with a mouse.

A parody of serious games and a satire of the wonderful world of business, this game takes you on a unique job interview to join Innovality, an innovation startup that innovates (well... in theory).

Through a series of absurd e-learning quizzes and situations as familiar as they are uncomfortable, you'll discover the joys of corporate jargon, vague objectives, and "inspiring" corporate values.

name: Veil: Project Conductor
summary: The train derails in an abandoned tunnel.No signal, no exits — only darkness and the broken remains of the carriage.You are an undercover journalist, and you had a reason to be on this train.

name: Vector Racing
summary: A racing game created by Sweet-Soft for iOS. The game's style is that of an old vector-style game. Later the game was ported to the eShop by Arc System Works.

name: VertiGhoul
summary: In this difficult 3D platformer where precision is key and a single wrong movement could be your death. Master the movements to get the fastest times and fulfill Death's List.

name: Venusian Vengeance
summary: In the year is 196X the communists won the space race and colonized Venus. Now the Americans have sent Sgt. Jon Dagger to Venus to destroy the Secret Soviet Science Facility.

name: Venba
summary: Venba is a narrative cooking game, where you play as an Indian mom, who immigrates to Canada with her family in the 1980s. Players will cook various dishes and restore lost recipes, hold branching conversations and explore in this story about family, love, loss and more.

name: Velvetist: The City of Machine Guns
summary: Velvetist: The City of Machine Guns is a 3rd person open world action-adventure game. The story of the main character Luka Vollek takes place in an old, socialist occupied city. The game is divided into consecutive linear missions that tell the story of the main protagonist.

name: Ventomori
summary: In this asymmetrical multiplayer co-op puzzle game, brave the treacherous unknown and endeavour on a deadly, desolate planet. Be the eyes from above or the scout on the ground and work together with a friend to uncover the mysteries and escape from the planet Xanahspati.

name: Vertex
summary: A 2-D, top-down, line-drawing, sci-fi, action-strategy game, Vertex demands your attention while challenging your reflexes. Whether you're travelling on new or existing orthogonal lines, your goal is simple: capture a percentage of the total screen area while avoiding enemy droids!

name: Velo Pro Racer
summary: Velo Pro Racer: The real road cycling simulator game designed to put you in the race. Build your own team, design your own kit, manage your own staff and riders, get sponsors and rise to the top of the World Tour!

name: Vengeance is Mine
summary: Vengeance Is Mine’s, brutal melee mech combat is augmented with a time-manipulation mechanic that adds a fascinating twist to encounters. Thanks to the capabilities of the HYDRA mech suit, the player will have the ability to speed up time and blink towards unsuspecting enemies, or rewind time to readjust combos or evade death. HYDRA also comes packing an energy-based projectile weapon that allows you to take on foes at distance.

name: Verticality
summary:
Samus finds herself on a very strange planet and must get out.
Verticality is a full-hack with new mechanics, enemies, items, and more.
Contains subtly remixed vanilla music.

name: Vector Strike
summary: Vector Strike is a fast-paced, physics based, non violent digital sport where mastery and teamwork are key to win. Shoot, double-jump, wall run, slide, dash, pass and score goals in intense matches where every decision counts. Pick your striker from a roster of powerful characters, each with unique abilities to master.

name: Ventilate
summary: A bullet hell top-down/isometric steampunk game where you must fight rogue constructs to get home and flee the city.

name: Vegangsters
summary: A 2D roguelike that brings deckbuilding games to the next level! Set in a world full of crime, you will take control of a potato inspector that uses cards to arrest criminal vegetables.

name: Vegangsters
summary: A 2D roguelike that brings deckbuilding games to the next level! Set in a world full of crime, you will take control of a potato inspector that uses cards to arrest criminal vegetables.

name: Vein
summary:
VEIN is a post-apocalyptic survival multiplayer sandbox game. Gather supplies to survive, explore abandoned buildings, defend your home, and rebuild society, whether alone or with friends.

Game is currently in around the clock development and will include bugs and potential room for improvement

name: Velocity Wings
summary: Hey there! Ready for a long-haul flight, pilot? Rumor has it only true experts can reach 100KM — want to give it a try?

name: VectorMan 2
summary: A routine sludge barge excursion is cut short when a mysterious missile critically damages VectorMan’s ship. Vectorman escapes destruction and freefalls back to earth, landing on the outskirts of a seemingly abandoned research facility.

name: Vegas Party
summary:
The game takes the player into the gambling-friendly universe of this over-the-top version of Las Vegas city.

Played as a race, the goal is to reach the end of the Strip before anyone else. Trust no one and forget the meaning of the word "mercy" because it does not apply here!

name: Verses of Hope
summary: Verses of Hope is a 2D platform game and interactive poetry adventure where you shape the world through the power of your words. Build your own poems to change the landscape and narrative.

name: VeggieTales: The Mystery of Veggie Island
summary:
The veggie kids are going on a Cub Sprout camping trip! With Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber as their Sproutmaster guides, Junior Asparagus and his friends must earn their merit badges on Veggie Island. But then trouble strikes, and what began as an ordinary camping trip might just end in disaster! Could Junior and the gang be stranded on the mysterious island forever?

Playing along with Junior Asparagus, kids must solve the riddle of Mr. Nezzer's ancestor to find a way off the island. Along the way, they’ll find a hidden treasure map, search for the buried treasure and play all sorts of challenging activities!

It's like playing a VeggieTales video! The Mystery of Veggie Island(TM) teaches kids an important lesson from the Bible: that God wants us to help others, even when they don't deserve it.

name: Vengeance: Lost Love
summary: When an urban legend comes true, Amada's family gets caught up in the haunting secrets of the mysterious lone miner. Uncover secrets long forgotten in this intense and enticing hidden object adventure!

name: Vendetta: Mafia Wars
summary:
The year is 1940 and the rules of the game has changed. The underground world in the United States is reborn along with new bosses. As a real-time strategy game, our product offers you the atmosphere of those times with all its glory by placing you in the heart of the mob wars that shaped the USA. Form your family, manage your economy, forge alliances with other families to outsmart your rivals.

While everybody is talking about the war in Europe, you must reshape the criminal underground and will have a sit down with six families to do so. Create your criminal empire and run your family, expand your turf and protect it against rivals. You are free to choose which path to take to be the greatest; find allies and prove your worth to them or back stab all and show how power hungry you are. Ultimately destroy all and be the real king of the city!

name: Vegas Stakes
summary:
In this Casino simulator, you have decided to be a high roller. Followed by four friends, their main objective is to risk the Lady Luck and become a high roller in Las Vegas, place of luxurious and refined gambling houses.

With only $1000 in your pocket, feel free to explore five different casinos (The Hideaway, Golden Paradise, Buffalo Head, The 2020 and later, the Laurel Palace), making the possible and impossible to increase its banking account and reach the goal of $ 10 million.

To be successful in this millionaire-journey, you'll have different options of how to earn lots of money: Blackjack, Slots, Roulette, Craps or Seven-Card Stud Poker.

Randomly, some people will chat with you, asking for some borrowed money, selling value objects and many other goodies: depending of the chatting, you'll be able to gain benefits (money increased) or damages (have half of its money stolen).

During this tough "mission", a friend (chosen by you in the Casino room) will help you, explaining in details the rules of the current game or offering some wager advices.

name: Velvet Dark
summary:
Velvet Dark is a canceled project that was planned as a sequel or spin-off of Perfect Dark.
The game was designed as a third-person stealth action game following Velvet Dark, Joanna Dark's sister though the relation wasn't stated in Perfect Dark.
Velvet appears as the co-op character in Perfect Dark.

Likely beginning as a Nintendo 64 title, the game was canceled at some point after the GameCube was announced in 2000.
The table of contents page of a design document for the game, dated the 30th of October 2000, was revealed on twitter by Gregg Mayles in 2015.

Compatibility with the Game Boy Advance was planned, probably similar to the way content in Perfect Dark could be unlocked with a connection to the Game Boy Color game, also titled Perfect Dark.
This would also mean there were plans for a Game Boy Advance companion game of some kind, though no work on a connected title has been revealed.

name: Vectro Blast
summary: Jump into endless fights in this arcade game. You have just one job: Survive as long as you can and beat your score over and over. The enemies are stronger with each wave so your journey to great score would not be easy.

name: Vedmy Zov
summary: And now he is forced to spend three nights at her coffin, fighting not only for his life, but also for the remnants of sanity. This visual novel in the best traditions of black humor and mystical horror

name: Venture Kid
summary: A 8-bit retro action platformer that goes beyond just pixels and chiptunes

name: Venba: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Venba Deluxe Edition includes:
Venba
Venba Soundtrack

name: Very Little Nightmares
summary:
Very Little Nightmares is a mobile puzzle adventure game where the user takes the control of The Girl in The Yellow Raincoat during her spiraling escape from an odd mansion.

Be smart, resourceful and ready for anything while exploring every nook and cranny of the place, for even the smallest error can lead to a fatal misstep.

Key features:
- Little Nightmares comes to mobile with an original story in the form of a puzzle adventure game
- Discover more about the backstory of The Girl in The Yellow Raincoat
- Explore the Nest, a vast palace filled with life-threatening traps
- Outwit enemies that awaits in every corner of this mansion

name: Vermillion Descent
summary:
After falling for what seems like forever, Dictum combat android VERSION-1.413^^10+2 finds herself in a mysterious otherworld deep below, an endless chasm devoid of life and futures. Without memory of who she was, who she is, or where she's located, all she can remember is that HOME is ABOVE.

Explore a beautiful and melancholy hand-drawn world inspired by the art of Tsutomu Nihei's Blame! and Aposimz. With only your wits and a one-ton coilgun attached to your arm, you must navigate the lower layers of the Follicle, an immense superstructure that seems to extend endlessly both in space and time.

name: Velgress
summary:
The space pirate Alpha is trapped in the deep pit known as Velgress. Help her climb out!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Veiled Edge
summary: Veiled Edge is a dynamic cyberpunk action-adventure platformer featuring multi-genre gameplay and innovative hacking mechanics. Dive, hack, and adapt your abilities to uncover the secrets of Full-Dive technology in a thrilling journey through virtual worlds.

name: Verdict Guilty
summary: Verdict Guilty is an easy to play 90's style arcade fighter! Featuring unique handcuff and gun combat in a cops versus robbers theme. Neo Seoul has been hit with a wave of terrorist and crime attacks, only a few good officers remain willing to battle this new evil.

name: Vestenelon
summary: This is a comedy RPG/Visual Novel hybrid which does not follow conventional rules. Fight monsters for a meager paycheck, fight trained mercs who steal said paycheck (Like the bullies at lunch!), watch your family starve, watch the news to see how badly you screwed up, get yelled at for not tipping.

name: Vertical Kingdom
summary: Vertical Kingdom is a roguelite that mixes cities and cards. Due to the fact that there is not much space, you have to build vertically, with the help of platforms and other constructions. You will go on expeditions to obtain resources that will help you improve your camp for your next trips.

name: Veranoia: Nightmare of Case 37
summary: Help Vera Herdman, a Gifted Detective who can get into victim's nightmares to reveal their mysterious death secrets, to escape the nightmare or reside there forever.

name: Vendrán las aves
summary: You bought a guitar with your severance pay. And you have enough savings to do without a job for a year. So you've decided to devote some time to yourself.

name: Velev
summary: Dive into VELEV's depths, a hidden world where technology and nature merge. Embark on quests, battle monsters, and unveil mysteries with enhanced gear. Experience intense PvPvE combat, strategic team play across diverse classes, and continuous character growth through exploration and extraction

name: Verdure
summary: Shape nature your way in a surreal playground of infinite plants and trees. Tweak their recipes, prune or let them flourish, and save your best creations into an ever growing collection.

name: Vetrix
summary: This ain't your Grandma's Tetris! Vetrix is a puzzle game inspired by Tetris, but with its own original mechanics built for virtual reality.

name: Vexbox
summary:
This is a demake of Vexbox for the Playdate.

Open, close, use, reveal, transform, and destroy boxes in pursuit of a box that wins you the game, avoiding any losing boxes you might find. Continue winning games to increase the number of unique box types available.

name: Vermillion
summary: Vermillion is a VR painting simulator, bringing the full analogue joy of oil painting into the digital world. Get the unrivaled sense of accomplishment from creating something beautiful on the canvas, without the messy living room.

name: Vera Blanc: Ghost in the Castle
summary: Vera Blanc is a mystery / detective game. Take on the role of Vera Blanc, a young woman with the ability to read other people's minds. The game is a mixture of visual novel and adventure game with a collection of challenging minigames, you can also play as a pure visual novel. In this episode, our heroine travels to a small village in central Italy.

name: Veil: Mirages
summary: Veil: Mirages is a short, dreamlike experience that blends psychological horror with an introspective narrative and philosophical themes. Chase, a 19 year old boy in search of meaning, is haunted by memories of what he once had. Will he overcome his internal struggles, opening the door to reconciliation?

name: Verocity
summary: Speed through Vero City in this free-to-play multiplayer racer! Customize your robot with animal-inspired abilities, grab power-ups, and outmaneuver rivals in fast-paced, high-tech races. Will you take the win? Download now!

name: Velvet Clouds
summary: Velvet Clouds - a story-driven game with elements of psychological horror and metroidvania. Explore locations, pick up items and destroy various enemies, and immerse yourself in an unusual story, interacting with the playable characters.

name: Vegetaball
summary: Psychic powers, vegetables, and sports meet for the first time in VEGETABALL! Choose your favorite veggie and master the psychic-arts to jump, dash, shoot and dodge your way to victory! Team up with friends in a physics-based competitive online sports arena. Build a group of veggie superstars to play together, or test your skills in a duel.

name: Venatio
summary: Venatio is a multiplayer horror-action game up to 4 players versus 1 monster. Monster and all players controlled by human players. You can create both action and horror elements, it is totally up to you.

name: VetVR: Veterinary Simulator
summary: As a brand-new veterinarian, you're tasked with the responsibility of saving animal lives while building your clinic's reputation. Play through real-life veterinary training, discover Easter eggs and unlock rewards as you learn all you need to treat emergencies, heal wounds, and diagnose illnesses.

name: Veil of Darkness
summary: Veil of Darkness is a true "real time" horror adventure game played from three screens, the 3-D overhead map, the character screen, and the full-screen map of the valley in which the game takes place. The term "real time" means that everything in the game is happening instantaneously with no breaks in game play. Portions of both the 3-D overhead screen and the character screen are displayed at one time. This prevents the need to switch from one screen to another during game play. The full-screen map of the valley is displayed whenever you wish to go from one location in the valley to another. All of the important icons and character information are displayed on the top portion of the character screen. This allows you to have the top of the character screen visible, while your character moves on the 3-D overhead map.

name: Vending Machine Co.
summary: Run your kawaii vending machine company! A relaxing sim where you run your own vending machine company across a charming Japanese city. Pick neighborhoods, stock up on snacks, and set the perfect price. Upgrade your machines and keep them stocked, one soda at a time!

name: Venturous in the Footsteps of the Fallen
summary: Drawing inspiration from Indianan Jones, Tomb Raider and The Mummy, Venturous is a Doom total conversion mod that follows an Indy-esque adventurer on an epic adventure. It takes place in the 1930’s and sees you on the trail of Nazis who are attempting to unlock the gate to the fabled city of Atlantis. You will explore ancient ruins in Mesoamerica and Egypt while also battling Nazis and mythical monsters.

name: Vermintide Collection
summary: Get the full Vermintide experience with the Vermintide Collection, containing Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide and Warhammer: Vermintide 2. Fight together with your friends against hordes of enemies in these brutal 4-player co-op action games set in the Warhammer Fantasy Battles world.

name: Vesnith Tapes
summary: A psychological horror game where a police officer investigates a cold case in a decaying house, uncovering a strange and haunting tape recorder that reveals a terrible secret.

name: Verse VR
summary: Immerse yourself in beautiful landscapes full of poetry, music, and art from around the world. Relax in a Chinese garden, explore the ruins of a mythical land, discover the joy of a West African village, and lose yourself in a Victorian conservatory. Welcome to a VR experience unlike any other.

name: Veins of Darkness
summary: Veins of Darkness is a first-person horror game. The hero is an ordinary shift worker. During a business trip, his company rented him a house on the outskirts. But no one knew what evil was hiding in this godforsaken place.

name: VenusBlood Gaia International
summary: Embark on the impossible quest to rescue the decaying world of Palastra in this dungeon defense SRPG, interwoven with a story of epic proportions!

name: Vessel
summary: Vessel is a multi-perspective puzzle game where you harness the power of object swapping to carve your path forward. Immerse yourself in the exploration of a forgotten underwater civilization, unveiling its mysteries as you navigate its intricate and atmospheric world.

name: Velocity Rift
summary: Velocity Rift is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you shoot orbs to defeat enemies and save the world. The number of orbs is limited and shooting enemies at their weak spots return the orbs faster. Also, the faster you move, the slower the world becomes, so always be on the move!

name: Vega Conflict: Punisher Cruiser Pack
summary: The most essential piece of any Xeno Division fleet is the brutal, all-purpose Punisher Cruiser. Now is the time to get yours! Pick up this pack to receive 3 Punisher Cruisers, as well as a full complement of Xeno Disintegrator Cannons to rain down destruction upon the Alien menace.

name: Vesseled
summary:
Deep into dark sewers, a creature made out of stones awakens. The walls are rotten, the floor slimy, but a calming song plays in the distance...

This vessel's body is weak, only being able to move when not seeing, you'll have to wander into the darkness with absolute certainty, you may not be alone in this journey.

name: Vesper
summary: Thousands of years after the activation of the Vesper Protocol, a small android crosses a fallen world, hunted by merciless machines, to control the power of Light and decide the fate of his race.

name: Vengeful Heart
summary: In this world corporations control even the most basic human necessities. Betrayed by the calculated cruelty of an evil corporation, Josephine finds herself homeless, jobless and without a heart. Believing she has nothing to lose, she joins a ragtag group of rebels seeking vengeance.

name: Vertigo 2
summary: Vertigo 2 is a single-player VR adventure. Explore the depths of the vast Quantum Reactor as you descend to finish your journey home.

name: Veil Play
summary: Find the killer hiding among the people!

name: Velldeselba Senki: Tsubasa no Kunshou
summary: A flight simulation shooting game set in the fictional planet Verdecelba. The main character Misaki who crashes on Verdeselba and survives the war while engaging with various people and the military. Unlike the Ace Combat series, this game emphasizes the appeal of flying slowly in the sky. You can't crash in this game unless shot down in battle by an enemy. You can also stand still in the air.

name: Vegas Casino & Slots: Slottist
summary: Discover the world's best Casino Slots Games! Play slots with unique game mechanics, explore amazing mini-games and master your casino skills!

name: Veilborn
summary: After an accident, you awaken in a world shaped by memories and suppressed emotions. Explore, solve puzzles, and confront or escape the ghosts of your past. Can you rebuild something worth remembering from the fragments of your history!

name: Verdge
summary: Verdge is a dynamic action rogue-like first-person platformer with various parkour mechanics, such as wall climbing, rope swinging, and grappling, where the player can decide which content is generated. Your goal is to run through procedurally generated levels and complete them as fast as possible.

name: Vectic: Boosted
summary:
Vectic: The motorsport of the future.

Every year the Vectic League draws millions of fans from all over the world.
This season you will not be one of them.
This season you will be a contender.
Race with skill, speed and daring to claim your place in the record books as a Vectic legend.

Vectic uses a turn based system to bring you a new racing experience. To be victorious is to be not only the fastest but also the smartest. Gain the edge by picking your way through obstacles, optimising corners or landing the perfect hit with a laser beam. Prevail on over 40 hand built race tracks.

name: Vex
summary: Vex is a retro, re-imagining of the classic arcade genre, and strikes the balance between simplicity and intricacy. It is a casual yet challenging game, reminiscent of the early days of video games, but with a more modern feel. Vex is a crowdfunded indie game, built with love and character in mind.

name: Vector Strain
summary: Addictive fast-paced shoot-em-up with beautiful 3D graphics and an amazing soundtrack. 5 ships to choose from and 5 action-packed Stages.

name: Vegetable Valley Nightmare
summary:
This hack only includes one level made up of all the Vegetable Valley levels with minor modifications and no collectable 1-Ups. (The 1-Ups are replaced with Tomatoes). The UFO secret was also removed.

You have no lives so when you die it’s game over and you have to start from the beginning.

name: Vector Lab
summary: Draw. Think. Let physics decide

name: VeggieTales: Minnesota Cuke and the Coconut Apes
summary: The Crock of Hookie Balookie has been stolen! Brave jungle hazards with Minnesota Cuke to locate the lost relic and return it to the museum. It won't be easy! This jungle is full of all sorts of perilous obstacles and creatures.

name: Veil of Sanity
summary: Veil of Sanity: Echoes of the Carnival (Chapter 1) combines psychological horror with intense gameplay. Keep your sanity intact as you explore a forsaken carnival. More chapters coming soon!

name: Vestigia: Joust
summary: The first historically accurate jousting simulator, running on Unreal Engine 5. Choose an environment and an opponent, then prove your worth in the lists through a physics-based confrontation adhering to Renaissance-era jousting rules and behaviors.

name: Versus
summary: Versus is an action-packed game combining 2.5D and 3D mechanics. Play as Zed on a mission to the enigmatic island of Isolux, battling fierce enemies and unraveling mysteries that only raise more questions. With unique levels, intense combat, and epic bosses, uncover the secrets lurking in Isolux.

name: Vectromirror 0
summary: Become the Test Subject and attempt to complete a challenging experiment to awaken emotional responses in your Artificial Intelligence. Jump, wall-run, and parkour your way through the free-to-play prequel to the upcoming game.

name: Verfall
summary: Verfall is a turn-based tactical RPG where you must strategically form teams to face a decaying world. Explore, uncover secrets, and use Karma-based abilities. Face challenges, make choices, and determine the fate of the world through multiple endings.

name: Vega Conflict: Paragon Battleship Pack
summary: The true firepower of the Altairian faction, Paragon Battleships trigger their explosive Barrage Overdrive when surrounded, ensuring they never go down without a fight.

name: Veilwalkers
summary: Veilwalkers is a dark fantasy roguelike deckbuilder where every card you play builds momentum. Strategically manage your deck, master turn-based combat, and battle through cursed forests filled with twisted enemies and eldritch secrets.

name: Venetica: Gold Edition
summary: In a fantastical Venice, The Corpus are deceived by a cunning necromancer. Transformed into an undead fiend, the conniving imposter is hell-bent on destroying the reinstated Death and the council of Corpus. Only Scarlett, the daughter of Death, can stand in his way.

name: Vellum: Raid Night Study Hall
summary: Brush up on your fighting mechanics with Raid Night Study Hall - your worry-free guide to boss fights! Learn, practice, and don't stand in the fire! You will be prepared!

name: Ventreville: A Cure for Sorrow
summary: Determine the fate of Ventreville, a city plagued by sickness and secrets. Play as six protagonists with unique abilities as you interrogate and outwit suspects, hide from enemies, crack puzzles, and even call the Gods for help! What are you willing to risk to find the truth?

name: Velistra: Failed State
summary: Assume the presidency of Velistra, a nation teetering on collapse. Every choice reshapes destiny amid ruthless factions, moral dilemmas, and global pressures. A careful balance must be struck in both economics and politics. How will you lead?

name: Vengeance of Mr. Peppermint
summary: Embody a hard-boiled detective seeking bloody justice. in an old-school, Korean-style beat-’em-up. Plow through the criminal underworld to find and punish those responsible for his sister's death...before his mind unravels and his vengeance completely destroys him.

name: Vextorial
summary: Vextorial is a mind-bending puzzle-platformer where you swap between 2D and 3D perspectives and twist gravity itself to solve impossible puzzles, explore a surreal, ancient ruin suspended in shifting dimensions, and uncover a mystery only you can piece together.

name: Vexbox
summary: Uncover and activate the hidden effects of an ever-changing pyramid in this minesweeper-like game of mystery boxes.

name: Verisim Skies
summary: Verisim Skies is a Vertical Shoot 'Em Up with an emphasis on story and cinematic action. Go forth, Champion. Find your purpose. Fulfill your destiny. Accept your fate.

name: Venture Valley
summary: Venture Valley is an esports-style multiplayer game that lets you pit your business savvy against friends and competitors. Slam down cards that will leave your opponents scrambling to deal with their muddling effects - or use the cards to bolster your own enterprises! Build your empire from scratch, starting with a dog walking business. Then, grow it by creating a successful mini-golf, pizza parlor, drone delivery service, robot factory, and other exciting companies. Earn money and reinvest in your hustle by upgrading your HQ, showing everyone who’s really the boss!

name: Venture Towns
summary: Venture Towns is a town simulator similar to Kairosoft's previous games.

name: Venny's Vinyl Shop
summary: Paint your own vinyl designs! Venny's Vinyl Shop lets you manage your dream vinyl store with various customers, lots of paint, and endless fun.

name: Vertical Force
summary:
Pilot a Futuristic Star Fighter in a Battle for Mankind!

GALACTIC YEAR 210. The earth and its colonies face annihilation in a futuristic war against the human race. YOU have been chosen to pilot RAGNAROK, a star fighter from an advanced alien civilization.

Reinforced by fearless AI CHARACTERS, you must locate and destroy menacing fighters and enemy droids. With sheer VERTICAL FORCE blast your way into another dimension to the final Virtual frontier. This mission for mankind is brutal. Be prepared, for it has only just begun!

name: Venture's Gauntlet VR
summary: Venture's Gauntlet VR is a thrilling, immersive adventure game set in breathtaking landscapes. Test your stamina, accuracy, wit and reflexes as you navigate treacherous terrain, solve puzzles, and navigate obstacles. So get ready to embark on the adventure of a lifetime!

name: VeryVeryHouse
