summary: We moved into our new home.We talked about little things and laughed about little things.Then strange things started happening in the house.But even those kinds of surprises can be fun now and then."VeryVeryHouse" is an adventure game.

name: Venue
summary: The world is in pieces... this is your responsibility now. The process will be excruciating, beautiful, and you will tolerate it entirely without question.

name: Vena
summary: Roguelike deckbuilder meets hex-tile city builder! Build a resource engine to survive the center’s rising demands. Place producers, converters, and combo-rich tiles. Roll dice to shop, pick perks, and chase wildly different builds every run.

name: Vector Thrust
summary: Vector Thrust is a fast-paced single and mulltiplayer combat flight game, using a unique cel shaded art style. With an extensive variety of game modes like the unpredictable and vicious Quick Action, a customizable Skirmish Mode, and multiple immersive story-based campaigns, Vector Thrust aims to please both players wanting to get straight into the sky and those who love a flexible, diverse and customizable gaming experience. Vector Thrust gives the player full power over the game to alter any aspect of the game they choose, ranging from simple tweaks to full-blown modifications. Adding user-made skins, changing unit performance and parameters or even complete battle scenarios is easy and open to anyone. With fully fleshed out Map, Mission and Campaign editors, Vector Thrust boasts unlimited expandability and adaptability.

name: Vending Dokan!: Kozy Kiosk
summary: Build a vending machine empire in this cozy idle sim! Manage staff, decorate locations, and watch your business thrive. Play actively or let it run passively in the background with relaxing music to enjoy while you work or unwind.

name: Vegas Nights
summary: Build, manage, and design your own casino empire from the ground up. Turn the city's junk into profit in this detailed management simulation, rising from rags to riches. Set up Blackjack tables and slots, hire staff, and furnish your venue with luxurious decor to become the ultimate boss.

name: Vespera Bononia
summary: Vespera Bononia is a fast-paced action-roguelite set in an ever-changing city. Fight as nightmares come to life and switch classes as a shifting soul. Master a mix of third-person shooter, magic and bullet hell to survive.

name: Velvet's Veil
summary: An adult narrative game combining meaningful choices and real-time action, set in an intriguing contemporary nighttime setting.

name: Vexlands
summary: Vexlands is a realm of surprises. Every newly opened space brings a surprise: loot, resources, dungeons, monsters and disasters! Build your village where you craft new equipment before you explore uncharted areas, and find relics that explain who came before and why these lands are cursed.

name: Veyora
summary: Veyora is a medieval open-world RPG with elements of farming, survival, and adventure. In a vast, stylized world, you decide where to live and what to create – whether near a bustling town, in the lonely mountains, or by a peaceful lake. Each location offers its own resources, challenges, and opportunities.

name: Vexcell
summary: Vexcell is an elegant, minimalist puzzle game. Embrace the satisfaction of everything falling into place.

name: Verismo
summary: A ghost and a carnival clown plot revenge on the man who ruined their lives. An operatic tragedy set in 1920s Sicily.

name: Vengeance
summary: With Vengeance, we are going back to the roots of Modern First Person Shooters and bringing those onto a more modern level! No Jetpacks, No Flying, straight on the ground action!

name: Vegas: Make It Big
summary: Develop a state-of-the art Las Vegas resort complex, using all the money and management skill you can. Customers on the living, breathing Las Vegas boulevard are Notoriously hard to satisfy - can you win the hearts and wallets of Vegas?

name: Vegas Infinite by PokerStars
summary:
PokerStars presents Vegas Infinite, a world of entertainment with no limits. Leap into virtual reality or, coming soon, sit back and play on PC with no headset required.

Take on the house at action-packed blackjack and roulette. Light up the dice with your friends at craps. Choose from a dazzling selection of slots, and challenge real opponents in cash, Spin & Go, Sit & Go, and multi-table tournament poker.

From luxury casino floors, private suites, and galactic space stations to soaring skylines and exclusive rooftop escapes, lose yourself in stunning environments while you play.

Be yourself with a giant collection of customizable accessories and apparel, and add a touch of magic to your gameplay with an endless supply of props.

Your seat is open.

name: Velocity 2X
summary: This critically acclaimed sequel to Velocity Ultra weaves together two classic game formats into one seamless adventure, featuring puzzle-platforming action alongside award-winning top-down shoot 'em-up gameplay!

name: Venator Universe
summary: Venator Universe is a sci-fi RPG survival game developed by VenatorGames. It aims to create a highly action-packed and hostile environment. The goal of the game is to survive, which requires players to gather resources, craft items, and improve themselves.

name: Verho: Curse of Faces
summary: Verho, a Dark RPG following the tradition of the King’s Field series, takes place after the catastrophic Era of Solitude, where masks have become the only protection against the Curse of Faces. Travel to the land of Yariv, find the source of this scourge and face its dangers.

name: Vendetta Forever
summary:
WELCOME TO CULT ACTION PARADISE

VENDETTA FOREVER fuses rapid-fire tactical gunplay with effortless acrobatic style in an unapologetic love letter to classic action cinema.

We take everything you love about top-tier VR action, remove the fluff and cut to the good part for 100% gunplay purity.

name: Verzaken!
summary: Verzaken! is a 3D action adventure set in a mysterious world. Guide your nameless, amnesiac protagonist through a unique procedurally generated world. Mine for collectible artifacts, unlock secrets, find hundreds of randomly generated weapons. Face off against an army of zombie robots, as you seek to discover what drives them, what they did to this world and it's people, and your true identity...

name: Venineth
summary: Venineth is a single-player game focusing on unraveling the mysteries of ancient alien technology, somewhere in the universe via exploration, platforming, and puzzle-solving, in a dangerous, distant worlds.

name: Veloren
summary:
Veloren is an open-world multiplayer voxel RPG. It is inspired by games such as Cube World, The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Dwarf Fortress and Minecraft.

Veloren is open-source. It is licensed under the GNU GPL 3.0 license. It uses original graphics, musics and other assets created by its volunteer community. Being contributor-driven, its development community and user community is one and the same: developers, players, artists and musicians come together to develop the game.

name: Verse Project
summary: Verse Project is a multiplayer space simulator featuring a simulation of the Solar System at a 1:1 scale

name: Veritus
summary: Unshroud secrets hidden deep within the dark chambers of the god of shadow, Veritus’ castle. Persevere through monsters and mysteries lurking in every corner. Prepare to leave camp and journey into the castle’s lonely halls by collecting resources and equipment to make it out alive.

name: Venus: Improbable Dream
summary: Born with a birth defect that he hates, Kakeru struggles with severe anxiety and depression. Guide his timid decisions as he takes a brave step into a new world - joining his school's music club, making unexpected and inspiring new connections, and daring to dream again.

name: Vertigo
summary:
Vertigo is a first person story-based shooter for the HTC Vive.

Explore the sprawling underground facilities of Planck Interdimensional's Quantum Reactor, filled with dark secrets, adorable drones, and parallel universes. You find yourself in the bowels of this machine after being whisked away from your home, and, armed with only the tools you can find, you must make your way to the surface, and the truth.

This machine lies mysteriously abandoned, but there may be something lurking in the darkness. Why else would those adorable security drones shoot on sight, and the turrets do their best to blast you into a small crater?

Face the challenge of escaping the depths of the quantum reactor.

name: Velocity Noodle
summary: Jump, slide and teleport to deliver Noodles in this fast-paced 2D platformer. Discover routes, moves and dodge traps to beat record times. Add to your Wishlist today!

name: Velocity Ultra
summary:
Velocity Ultra is an award-winning top down shooter that puts you in control of the galaxy’s only Quarp Jet, an advanced spacecraft with the ability to teleport at will. Tasked with rescuing survivors from a collapsed black hole, you’ll need to use both firepower and quick-wits to catapult the Quarp Jet through 50 levels of sci-fi action.

Featuring explosive visual effects, an anime-inspired art style and an exhilarating electronic soundtrack, Velocity Ultra combines the speed, ferocity and challenge of classical arcade shooters while introducing a whole new layer of complexity to the genre with unique puzzle mechanics.

name: Vexx
summary: Step into the role of Vexx as he seeks vengeance on those who murdered his grandfather and enslaved his people. Equipped with a set of razor-sharp war talons, you'll travel through volcanic islands, desert temples, frozen citadels, and giants' castles to confront the evil Dark Yabu, Shadowraith, and their minions. As darkness falls, enemies become more aggressive and the environments become more hostile. It will take all your combat skills and climbing moves to bring peace back to the villagers of Rockhaven.

name: VED: Purification
summary: VED is a story-driven RPG with a unique turn-based combat system and rogue-lite elements. The free version "Purification" lets you explore the very beginning of VED's narrative and see if its world, art style and music draw you in - and continue where you left off in the full game!

name: Vertical Slice: A Game Dev Story
summary: From nobody to famous game producer in 3 years: that’s the journey you will live! Experience the trials and tribulations of game development in this life simulation game: live through the process of founding a small team and learning how to work together to develop a successful game.

name: Vesta
summary:
Set in a highly technological universe, with Vesta you will again feel the challenge of traditional puzzle games mixed with more arcade elements, all within a very elaborate and fascinating story.

Gears, robots, mystery, humour, challenges, fun and action … Vesta is that, and much more.

name: Ven'rif
summary: A CASUAL REAL-TIME STRATEGY GAME Summon unique creatures, cast explosive spells, survive the assassination! Ven'rif is a casual real-time strategy card game where you build a deck of collectible cards and fight against another player on the battlefield. Ven'rif simplifies what other real-time strategy games can't all the while retaining the depth of the gameplay at a cheap expense of a shorter playtime.

name: VectorMan
summary:
By the year 2049, Earth has been turned into a toxic waste dump. Humankind has fled into space leaving behind an army of mechanized “Orbots” to clean up the mess.
But when the Orbot leader “WarHead” goes haywire and starts a global revolt against the humans, it falls on the shoulders of the last Orbot loyal to its human masters to save the planet.

name: Velgrym
summary: Velgrym Play as Chalara, trapped between life and death for past sins. Explore memory worlds where sinful souls wander. Uncover truths and choose: grant peace or send them back. Each choice shapes the story and reveals Chalara's own sin. Do sins come from soul or environment? You decide.

name: Venatrix
summary: Venatrix is a unique hybrid of action-packed and stealth-based horror game.

name: Veilborne Sacrament
summary: Veilborne Sacrament is an immersive psychological horror experience centered around atmosphere, puzzles, and emotional tension.

name: Veiled Experts
summary: Free-to-Play 5v5 tactical shooter where agent's unique Lepton skills meet action- packed gun mechanics. Available on Steam!

name: Veil Runners
summary: Veil Runners is an action roguelite arena auto-shooter where you fight through waves of creatures to reach the next planet in search of the source. Level up, loot, buy randomly generated items and more to upgrade your character and units into an awesome and game-breaking build.

name: Ved
summary: Ved is a story-driven, hand-drawn RPG with a unique turn-based combat system and roguelite elements. Set in two different worlds, VED tells the story of Cyrus, a young hero who sets out on a quest to become a master of sword and magic, and save everything he knows from destruction.

name: Verdun
summary: Verdun is the first multiplayer FPS set in a realistic World War One setting, the game which started the 1914-1918 WW1 Game series. The merciless trench warfare offers a unique battlefield experience, immersing you and your squad into intense battles of attack and defense.

name: Verge: Lost Chapter
summary: Our hero has decided to get away from the urban bustle and out into nature to relax. On his way to his cabin, while anticipating the amazing sunsets, fresh air, the tranquility of the mountains, a heavy rain began to fall. His car breaks down in the middle of nowhere, the cold torrential rain dashing any hope of getting the car moving again. He hadn’t seen another person in hours, and as far as he could recall, there was nothing around…but for an abandoned building. He approaches it, seeking shelter, but is it really abandoned?

name: Vestiges: Fallen Tribes
summary: Vestiges: Fallen Tribes is a unique blend of strategy, board game mechanics, and autobattler gameplay. Immerse yourself in a sci-fi world where tribes are battling for water, and your tactical decisions will shape the future. As a tribe leader, you’ll use a deck of cards to summon and command animated units round after round, until you come out on top.

name: Vernal Edge
summary: Vernal Edge is a 2D action-packed Metroidvania featuring an intense combat system, tight platforming sequences and a powerful story of rivalry, revenge and growth.

name: Vetitum_VRC
summary: Explore all the video tapes about the forest and the paranormal activities that happen, discover all the secrets by controlling who records these videos in a first person experience. Do not watch the video too many times, there is something strange about it.

name: Vendetta: Curse of Raven's Cry
summary: Step into the boots of the vicious pirate Christopher Raven and get revenge on the men who killed your family and took your hand. Explore the Caribbean on land and sea, slaying your enemies with a combination of blades, bullets and cannon-fire. Vendetta’s free-flowing combat system allows you to dispatch your foes in a variety of brutal ways; use blocks, counters, parries, pistols, combos and devastating finishing moves utilizing Christopher’s hook to strike terror into the hearts of your enemies.

name: Velvet Assassin
summary: Inspired by the fascinating story and unbreakable spirit of British secret agent Violette Szabo, players take control of Violette Summer, a beautiful World War II spy deep behind enemy lines with no support or official backing from the British Government. Intense stealth action game play with a startling real-time lighting system and surreal visuals combine to produce an incredible gaming experience. Through third person game play, sneak up on enemies and pull the pins from their belted grenades. Infiltrate a Gestapo prison and slip cyanide to your own men before the Germans make them talk. And slink through the shadows to finish off your unsuspecting enemies with a single, silent move. Through Violette's fever dreams, experience what she experienced. Walk where she walked. And kill those she killed.

name: Velaster
summary: Velaster is a gruesome 2.5D side-scrolling action combat game set in the Middle-earth called Malum. You will find yourself growing in battles against various monsters and bosses. Take revenge that remains in your fading memories.

name: Vessel
summary: Vessel is a game about a man with the power to bring ordinary matter to life, and all the consequences that ensue.

name: Venetica
summary:
In a fantastical Venice, The Corpus are deceived by a cunning necromancer. Transformed into an undead fiend, the conniving imposter is hell-bent on destroying the reinstated Death and the council of Corpus. Only Scarlett, the daughter of Death, can stand in his way.
Knowing nothing of her destiny at first, Scarlett has to learn about her special powers and become a mighty warrior, strong enough to defeat the greatest threat to the world of the living.
She must master her incredible supernatural powers and capabilities, in order to save her father and curse the necromancer and his gruesome henchmen to the eternal hereafter.

name: Vertical Drop Heroes HD
summary: Vertical Drop Heroes is a procedural platformer RPG hybrid with roguelike elements, where your hero adventures through randomly generated stages. Armed with a variety of skills and traits, you must use your cunning and reflexes to survive the dangers of each stage, until you face the final boss and uncover the truth behind the game!

name: Vendir: Plague of Lies
summary: Vendir: Plague of Lies is a classic party-based RPG with a deep storyline and initiative-based combat. Experience an intricately crafted world, steeped in history and brought to life through a carefully crafted atmosphere and the trials and tribulations of stories of the people that inhabit it.

name: VenusBlood Frontier International
summary: Loki Muspelheim, an exiled member of demon nobility strives for the throne of the Dark Lord who has wronged him. To succeed the throne and exact his revenge, he must obtain the hidden treasure on the Floating Continent of Yggdrasil, protected by the goddesses of the seasons and their Chief God Odin.

name: Vertig8
summary: In Vertig8, explore a vertical world unlike any other. Ascend through a skyscraper, engaging in strategic gameplay and exhilarating action. Join internet celebrities in this unique multiplayer experience. Experience Vertigo and redefine your gaming adventure.

name: Vex Clock
summary: Vex Clock is a Clockpunk styled action-adventure, where you must run, gun and save the kingdom from absolute corruption. Your choices with who you bond with will shape the final outcome.

name: Vec-Man
summary: Minimalistic Pac-Man clone in the style of the original eighties' Vectrex games

name: Verge
summary: Text Based Horror Game

name: Vex
summary: A game released for the Mega Duck/Cougar Boy in 1993.

name: Venus Voyager 2
summary: Lunar Lander clone

name: Vermillion Watch: Parisian Pursuit
summary: Can you stop a powerful foe from taking over Paris?

name: Vextar
summary: Cyborg disc battles in the year 3020.

name: Venture Arctic
summary: Venture Arctic is the sequel to Wildlife Tycoon: Venture Africa.

name: Verminest
summary: A traditional arcade-like fixed shooter released under a Creative Commons license.

name: Venandi In Silva
summary: This game is a game to hunt animals in the forest. Aim for a high score by hunting more animals. Enjoy this random game.

name: Ventilator
summary: A game written by Peregrine Wade for the Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Vector Vaders
summary:
Aside from having vector graphics and running a bit slow (although the game does speed up as more and more invaders are shot), this is a pretty standard Space Invaders-type game for the most part.

A formation of invaders (25 total) march from side to side while dropping bombs and they will drop down a notch once the formation reaches the edge of the screen. The player’s laser base can take cover behind one of four bunkers on the screen, which the bunkers can withstand 16 shots from enemy and/or player fire before disappearing. A flying saucer will also pass overhead during a level and is worth big points if shot. The player starts off with three laser bases and the game will end once all bases are destroyed or if the player is “invaded” by the aliens reaching the bottom of the screen. However, an extra base is earned if over 3000 points are scored. The level number that the player is currently on is displayed at the bottom right corner of the screen.

name: Veridian Expanse
summary: Explore the depths as you drill, craft, and fight to escape from a mysterious asteroid deep in the Veridian Expanse.

name: Vertix.io
summary: A 2D multiplayer browser game with guns.

name: Vertical Fighters
summary: Vertical Fighters is a top-down shooter with a tactical Rock-Paper-Scissors twist! Play as 4 unique classes that hard-counter each other, experiencing moments of exhilarating counter-play, fun cooperation and fiendish treachery. Customise your variants, camos and pilots for maximum skill expression!

name: Vermillion Watch: Moorgate Accord - Collector's Edition
summary: Who broke the agreement between good and evil?

name: Veneficium
summary: Veneficium is a cute and magical 3D platformer in which you help Alice uncover the faith of her coven. Alice has to use her magic to interact with different objects within a vast and magical world to overcome puzzles and obstacles.

name: Very Serious Future Detective
summary: Everyone is guilty, you just have to find proof.

name: Vertical Golf
summary: Golf turned on it's side. Aim your sights up and try to reach the hole in as few strokes as possible.

name: Ver
summary: Ver is a horror adventure game where you as the player try to end a curse by collecting five crystals. Loot batteries, medical supplies and energy boosts all to aid you on your adventure of stopping the curse. Watch out for the roaming mutants which only have one goal, chase you down and kill you...

name: Vega Strike
summary: Vega Strike is a first-person space trading and combat simulator, developed for Microsoft Windows, Linux, FreeBSD and OS X systems. Many of the core game mechanics of Vega Strike are indirectly inspired by Elite.

name: Versus Squad
summary: Versus is a fast action twin-stick shooter from the creator of Nation Red. Create your own sandbox defense before doing battle with thousands of enemies in fast-paced top down combat. Face up to a dozen bosses. Simultaneously. Play in single player, on-line or local coop with up to 4 players.

name: Vegetarian Alliance
summary: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS , DOTA" makes you happy, crazy game play at home makes you addicted, while you are crazy, your fat is also growing infinitely! Come join the "Vegetarian Alliance" and follow us to fight junk food and become a super god!

name: Velocity Valley
summary: Race up to 8 players for the fastest lap in 7 minutes. Manage tire wear (soft, medium, hard). Completing 8 laps earns players a coin bonus to unlock new tracks. Violations such as going on the grass, crashing, or multiple cars in the pitlane incur a 3-second penalty.

name: Verlies II
summary:
"Beware adventurer! The danger here is far beyond your skills, do not risk your miserable life.
...
Still there?
Interesting."

name: Venice Deluxe
summary: A puzzle shooter game that features a player controlled gondola that shoots various shapes at holes of the same shapes in effort to stop buildings from sinking into the waterways of Venice,Italy

name: Venatur
summary: Venatur is a Online PVPVE first person shooter, extract and survive, loot valuable items, craft better equipment, complete 3 story lines quests.

name: Vela
summary: Atmospheric candlelit stroll

name: Vega Conflict: Dread Battleship Pack
summary: Ready to rule the galaxy with an iron fist? Check out the Dread Pack: a one of a kind array of weaponry, resistance tech, and high value gold. The Dread Battleship will allow you to take the fight to your enemies.

name: Veggie Menace
summary: After a failed spell during a vegetable contest in the Middle Ages, the vegetables come to life and try to invade the civilization. A little witch with her magic powers will need to fight against this invasion.

name: Vespa's Test
summary: Vespa's Test is a short, relaxing personality test based on real psychological research. Answer a multitude of thought-provoking questions, and receive a vision tailored to your answers; what, in life, is holding you back?

name: Veccol
summary: Blocks of different size and color falls from the top, rearrange the colors and place the blocks to match three or more of one color in any direction. Set up cascading line-clears for extra points.

name: Vector Runners
summary: Explore virtual environment and fight with fast hostiles and deadly structures!

name: VectorWars
summary: VectorWars is a cool arcade style space shooter with full support for VR and non-VR. Get your ship, upgrade stuff, and give them hell.

name: Velocity Raptor
summary: Velocity Raptor is a game in which you travel near the speed of light in order to get past seemingly impossible sections.

name: Veiled
summary:
It has been one year since the incident. One endlessly long year looking for the truth.

You know your child is alive. All the answers must be out there...

name: Verlore Slange: Bundle
summary: 2 diametrically opposed realms amalgamated together. One of tranquility, mystery and discovery. The other of violence, adrenaline and surviving absurd creatures. Can you conquer the whole spectrum that these 2 worlds offer? Are you ready for a journey that will put you to the test in more ways you can imagine?

name: Vegas Casino 2
summary: Vegas Casino 2 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Phoenix Games, which was released in Europe in 2005.

name: Verdict
summary: Establish your written character in a world of many. Craft, fight, and befriend your way to the top against real players, all of which have their own goals and their own motives. Become the leader of a country- slay titans- create new magic- and more.

name: Vette!
summary: Vette is an open-world racing game set in San Francisco. The player can choose from a range of Corvette's and race them against a range of European cars on several courses in San-Francisco.

name: Vexed Heroes
summary: Welcome to Vexed Heroes! Fun fast paced survival bullet hell, unlock classes and create your own powerful builds and rage through endless new game plus!

name: Vectors
summary: Avoid obstacles and reach the end of each level by controlling the direction of Vectors. Can you manage your actions without going off the tangent?

name: Vertigo: Binaural Beats
summary:
Beware! The game might take you over after some time of gameplay!
In an altered reality parallel universe you as the glowing dot named "vertigo" try to escape the impossible maze with traps!

name: Veloce
summary: Way back in the twentieth century, as we reached for the stars, we came across an offensive entity, known as the Peste Nera. This entity attacked our planet years ago, out numbering any defenses we had. But now it’s our time to fight back. We are Veloce, the elite galactic defense force. Equipped with the most agile fighters in the world, the enemy won’t know what hit them!

name: Vecdrift
summary: Car racing game

name: Veilia
summary: Veilia is an exploration adventure game, which focuses on the story of Veilia, a cursed girl who has been separated from her body. It is now your job to help her in her search for her old body as well as the sorcerer that took it from her.

name: Vertex
summary: Vertex is a puzzle logic game, where players are challenged to connect vertices in order to formulate triangles and create an image.

name: Vengeance RPG
summary: Vengeance is a single-player RPG in which you can immerse yourself in a story accompanied by beautiful music and atmosphere. Your journey will be rewarded with legendary and mythical items.

name: Venom Vendetta
summary: Venom Vendetta is a short single tech-base-themed mbf21 map for Doom2. The main focus was to make a map with a small monster count that could be quickly completed.

name: Ventisette Voci
summary: I dadi non mentono mai / The dice never lie

name: Versus: Unfriendly Frenzy
summary:
Three eccentric factions battle endlessly for dominance of their strange land. But who is this mysterious new foe? To emerge victorious, your strategy cannot be half-baked...
Versus: Unfriendly Frenzy is a fast-paced take on real-time strategy, with outlandish units to command, wacky maps to explore and exciting challenges to overcome!

name: Vessel
summary: A short piece about an AI discovering it is not human.

name: Vega Tank
summary: Remember the good old times you spent your days playing Tanks on the NES with your family? Remember all those times when they had won, they gloated and made fun of you? Well now is the time you pay them back!

name: Verdungo
summary: King Verdungo has been taken hostage and it's up to you to rescue him. Travel across a diverse world to make your way back home, hopefully you arrive in time to save him before he meets an untimely demise.

name: Vestige of V'othlog
summary: Vestige of V'othlog is a short four-level episode inspired by the classic themes of Quake. The pack was designed for 2021 re-release (KexQuake) but it has also been tested with Ironwail.

name: V.E.D.A
summary: V.E.D.A is a Soulslike training game with weighty combat and exploration. The protagonist, awakened with no memory, undergoes combat training in a training simulator and uncovers hidden secrets. You too can enter the Soulslike genre. Don't hesitate.

name: Vestige
summary: Vestige is a third-person Action Platformer student-made game in which you play as a small adventurer, eager to uncover forgotten secrets. Jump and dash through various challenges and experience an exciting and fast-paced combat against a variety of enemies.

name: Vengeance of Excalibur
summary: An action role-playing game based in 11th century Spain.

name: Vergjorn
summary: Vergjorn is a citybuilding strategy game. Vergjorn takes place in the Viking era, where you build your city, grow your population and go raiding for treasure. You have to build ships, train vikings and forge weapons to be able to conquer foreign lands.

name: VeLM
summary: VeLM is an atmospheric adventure in Xibalba, the Mayan underworld, full of enemies and traps set by the Gods of Darkness. Unlock the secrets of the ancient myths, defeat the powerful Hun-Came and save the town of San Lamar from the curse.

name: Veil of Clay
summary: A woman magically appears in Clay's home and he is swept into an adventure that forces him to come to terms with his selfish behavior, or be a coward and not face his weaknesses. Clay comes to question the essence of love, companionship, and who he is going to be.

name: Vertigo
summary:
Vertigo is a white knuckle race over wild landscapes collecting upgrades, discovering hidden shortcuts and utilising power ups; you must negotiate some of the most challenging courses in the Universe. Race across tracks suspended high above sprawling cities and lush vistas, but don’t miss a turn… it’s a long way down!

Over 50 courses across 9 stunning environments.

name: Vectrace
summary: Weave your way through the other race cars and toward the checkered flag!

name: Vertical Adventure: Jump, Die, Retry
summary: Vertical adventure is a mobile platformer that requires precision and reflex

name: Vector Pinball
summary: Free and open source pinball game with vector graphics and accurate physics.

name: Vectron
summary: Officially only published on The Games Collection 2, later declared freeware by Cas Cremers, the author. Won the 1st prize in the MSX Computer Magazine/Eurosoft games programming contest.

name: Vendetta: Curse of Raven's Cry - Deluxe Edition
Versus: The Deathscapes
summary: When a new threat emerges on planet Versus, you and your allies are forced to explore the dreaded Deathscapes to survive.

name: Vertigo
summary: A game where the maps are skyscrapers, hide from your enemies, many modes coming, battle royale, deathmatches capture the flag, search and destroy, conquest, survival and more. Kill and cheat on your opponents to be the best player , build your team of friends and fight to survive.

name: Vector Light
summary: A 2D abstract puzzle game where the goal is to find the right pattern to maximize your scores!

name: Vehicle VR
summary: Welcome to Vehicle VR, an addicting and rage-inducing game. Your goal is to complete levels by getting to the finish box. All maps are made to test your common knowledge and quick reflexes. Compete with your friends and people around the globe to get the fastest times! VR is not required.

name: Versus Hero: Kakutou-ou he no Michi
summary: Early crossover fighting game for Game Boy, with characters from Kamen Rider, Ultraman, and Gundam franchises.

name: Vegas Casino Slots Mania
summary:
Bigger payouts! Bigger bonuses! Bigger wins!
Play Vegas Casino Slots Mania on your iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch.
Fun themes to play

name: Vector Assault 2
summary: Fight off waves of enemies to reach the highest score possible.

name: Vestige Memoria
summary: Vestige Memoria is an episodic horror game, in which we take paranormal stories, and turn them into horror experiences. In these thrilling horror experiences, take control of the survivors of these memories, living through these experiences as described by the person.

name: VeggieTales: Veg-Out! Family Tournament
summary: VeggieTales is a puzzle game for the Game Wave

name: Vermitron
summary: They're Coming! Get ready to defend your lovely Flower from invading insect! Prepare your Bug Spray, Call your Holo-Pet, Fortify base and don't forget your mission: Find the Watering-Can!

name: Vektor Z
summary: Vektor Z brings fast and furious retro space blasting action to Steam! Blast your way through endless waves of asteroids and enemies to write your name among the stars! Vektor Z offers both relentless action and vibrant visuals that is certain to have you playing again and again!

name: Versus: Battle of the Gladiator
summary:
Versus is a gladiatorial PvP action game with brutal non-targeting melee combat. You're a slave gladiator captured by Claderan empire, the conqueror of the world. Fight alone, or team up other players in bloody gladiatorial battle to prove your strength.

Destroy your enemies to rise as a victor, and become the legend of the arena.

name: Vectorgeddon
summary: Vectorgeddon is a Missile-Command-styled game where you must defend the Earth from asteroids.

name: Veil: Alter Unknown
summary: A mysterious Sci Fi 3D platformer with a grappling hook, glider, and connection lost.

name: Venari
summary: Embark on an epic adventure to an ancient, mysterious island where your escape room puzzle skills will be put to the test. In Venari, uncover the secrets hidden on the island and discover the legendary Venari artefact.

name: Veil Transfer
summary: An atmospheric, arcade first-person horror game where your sole job is to root out the Veils who take on the identity of humans. Interrogate and execute monsters that hide within people, and protect yourself while managing your ammunition and transfers.

name: Venice Beach Volleyball
summary: Venice Beach Volleyball is no doubt the coolest video game under the hot summer sun. Check it out! We took miles of clear blue sky, warm sand, along with millions of gnarly 8-foot waves, mixed in dudes, babes, and one ton of pure fun, then crammed the whole thing with the maximum amount of challenge and excitement allowable by federal law. Here you have it, the most excellent beach volleyball game ever! Locals say kicking the butt of a computer controlled team is never easy without a lot of practice. You haven't seen anything until you challenge a friend head to head in competitive double player action mode. Way rad beach volleyball action, blazing 8-bit graphics and killer tunes. That's what VENICE BEACH VOLLEYBALL is all about!

name: VEV: Viva Ex Vivo
summary: An action game about exploring various environments on a microscopical level, with puzzle and survival elements.

name: Vega
summary: Vega is a fascinating pixel-art style quest. Young Mary - the protagonist of the game, running away from her pursuers, loses consciousness, and wakes up in a completely different place. Infinite, but as if asleep city, from which at first glance there is no way out. What to do?

name: Vengeful Rites
summary: The evil warlord, Dragore, has returned and none but you remain to stop him. Explore infested mines, ancient cities and other worlds on an epic VR adventure. With sword in hand, a bow on your back and powerful magic at your finger tips, the fate of the realm weighs heavily on your capable shoulders.

name: Vedmaak
summary: Vedmaak is an action RPG with Turn-Based Combat centered around battling foes and gathering valuable loot. Vedmaaks, elite warriors adept in melee combat, marksmanship, and practical magic, are sought for missions surpassing the abilities of ordinary warriors.

name: Veggie Tales 3D
summary: Small, irate vegetable RPG.

name: Vektor Prix
summary: Vektor Prix is a fast paced combat racing game with a full-color vector display. It supports single-player and multiplayer, AI bots of varying difficulty, a variety of weapons, entities to interact with, controller support, and game modes such as racing, deathmatch, or team deathmatch.

name: Verydice
summary:
Roll dice. Win tickets. Get real stuff.

It really is that simple.

Tap and hold the button to roll your dice. Whatever you roll, you win in tickets. Redeem your tickets for brand new electronics, gadgets, and more. It's like real life arcades!

Face it. You're going to spend (waste) time playing games anyway, right? Might as well get some cool stuff while doing it!

name: Vectrix
summary: Vectrix is a rhythmic, techno, top-down shoot 'em up with a synthwave soundtrack and a grid of enemies based on John Conway's "Game of Life" cellular automaton!

name: Velocispider
summary: Part Spider, Part Velociraptor, it's Velocispider!!! Take control of a heavily armed araknasaur in this retro arcade shoot-em-up.

name: Vertrix 3
summary: An improved version of Vertrix 2.

name: Veil of Darkness
summary: In a world shrouded in darkness, where the forces of evil hold dominion, one hero must rise to the challenge.Prepare for an epic journey into the heart of darkness with 'Hexen: Veil of Darkness' - a fresh and fiendish hub adventure utilising the power of GZDoom's Hardware mode. In this corner of Cronos, a shadowy sorceress, the notorious and macabre Mistress Nox, has acquired the Chaos Sphere. With its dark power at her disposal, she's been busy building an army of abominations, casting the world into eternal twilight. You are the chosen one, a hero marked by the Gods themselves. Your divine quest? Venture through treacherous swamps, delve deep into haunted forests, explore creepy castles and dungeons, and ultimately unlock the enigmatic portal to the Shadow Realm.

name: VectorWave
summary: VectorWave translates the traditional tower defense experience into virtual reality, allowing players the freedom to buy, place, toss, and move turrets as they see fit with minimal menu interaction.

name: Vector 2
summary: Intense parkour-themed roguelike runner game set in a dystopian world.

name: Verdoria's Kingdom Quest: Magic, Battles & Sorcery
summary: Discover this exciting visual novel where brave heroes unravel ancient mysteries and spells. An epic journey you won't want to miss!

name: Velsabor
summary:
Velsabor is a game by Lachsen, started in the year 2002 and first released as a demo in 2005. It is classical RPG and is often cited as one of the best German RPG-Maker games ever to be released and won several community awards.
A final demo was released in 2013 before the game got canceled for being to ambitious for an hobby project.

name: Vertical Velocity
summary: Vertical Velocity forces the player to use precise movements to navigate obstacles and courses as the sun. Your goal is to defeat the moon and take your place back in the sky.

name: Versus Dev
summary: Explore, evolve and take on the developer.

name: Vestigial
summary: Sometimes, nightmares follow us into the waking world, leaving us with only pieces of ourselves. Better get back to where you belong before your pieces run out.

name: Venice Master
summary: Become a craftsman in the Renaissance Venice. Develop business after business, be resourceful and creative. Many tasks can be completed only if you construct the most suitable machines first. No need to give it any more thought, just roll up your sleeves and get to work!

name: Vertical Blast Vol. 1
summary: Dive into the thrilling universe of arcade shoot 'em ups with Vertical Blast Vol.1, an exclusive bundle by TOMAGameStudio!

name: Vector Madness
summary: Vector Madness is the spiritual successor to Killbox.

name: Veranda
summary: Inspired by my love of malls and the album Illuminations by FM Skyline. A fairly linear adventure through a dreamily brutalist structure with a few tonal shifts and surprises sprinkled in.

name: Venom Wing
summary: Venom Wing is a weird mishmash of styles: You pilot a standard R-Type clone spaceship. Sometimes it turns into an eagle. Enemies include demons, robots, organic lifeforms, nondescript bouncing objects, and a gigantic dragon in space. The final boss is ED-209 from the Robocop movie.

name: Velcro Mind
summary: The player here controls the movements of a disc with their mouse. The disc is divided into four quarters, each a different colour, identifying with balls of four various colours zooming around the playfield and four differently-coloured wall-mounted hands grasping out, waiting for the player to deliver a ball of the appropriate colour. In order to ensnare a ball (as though they were complementary sides of a velcro connection), the player must rotate the disc using the mouse buttons to ensure that the side facing the ball is of the same colour as the ball itself when they connect. Colour-mismatched connections result in taking a hit; after twelve such failures, the game is over.

name: Vekquence
summary: Vekquence is a simple puzzle game about finding the correct path when there isn’t one. Failing or trying something more radical might open up a new opportunity to discover a new path, a new angle at the challenge solution.

name: Vera: The Last Hope
summary: Hack and slash through a frenetic roguelite and cut your way to the Demon King. Upgrade your favorite abilities and equip new ones as you progress, making countless variations each run.

name: Vertex Vortex Remix Cortex
summary: Vertex Vortex Remix Cortex is a remixed version of Vertex Dispenser by Smestorp. It was created as a bonus for the St Patrick's Day Indie Royale bundle.

name: Vega
summary: You are part of an army of androids designed to travel through space in search of a potential exoplanet that humans can populate. Your job is to build your arsenal and train at zero gravity during this galactic journey to face and fight the possible threats that could be found once landed.

name: Veritex
summary: Project Veritex intends to become the best multiplayer survival game on the market. Join us on this adventure as we birth into creation this concept from nothing.

name: Veins
summary:
Outside of your room you meet a strange boy, who claims he is your friend, and you must find your true past by walking through all the worlds behind all of the drips.
By walking through maps, you can truly become friends with your companion, and deduce what was your past, and why you forgot everything.
You must gain all effects and make some good decisions to get the best ending.

name: Verytex
summary: Verytex is a shoot-'em-up game released exclusively in Japan. Taking place on the colonized fictional planet of Syracuse in a futuristic sci-fi setting, where its military force initiated a violent coup d'état against the inhabitants for unknown reasons, players take control of the titular space fighter craft in an attempt to overthrow the enemies, protect civilization and discover the true cause for the rebellion.

name: Verse Hopper
summary: Verse Hopper is a Gzdoom-centered community project. The goal is to create high quality maps with a selected set of custom textures and monsters.

name: Vestiges
summary: a list of remnants of a spacefaring civilization for list jam

name: Vera Cruz
summary: In your job as a detective sergeant in the crime squad, you are called upon to investigate what the press are fast terming "The Vera Cruz affair". Prostitute Vera Cruz lies sprawled on the floor. The more observent among you will have noticed the pool of blood that has poured from a bullet wound in her chest. It is believed to be a case of suicide but you have to prove that this was murder. If you can bear to go past the beautiful girl, you are returned to HQ where the telex machine is used to gain information about possible suspects. Vera Cruz is a very faithful reconstruction of how a real murder investigation would be carried out. Let's enter the sordid underworld of detectives, pimps and prostitutes.

name: VeeR Pong
summary: So you think you are pretty good at throwing ping pong balls into plastic cups? Well we will see about that hot shot. Welcome to VeeR Pong, where you can test your skills against anyone at any time of day.

name: Veins
summary: Renovate homes with your friends in this radical fast paced organ-based physics defying multiplayer refurbishing experience!

name: Ventura Inc
summary: In Ventura Inc you can play with friends and foes to try and become the richest company in the world. Sign contracts with others. Run your business to avoid bankruptcy. You'll be competing with others to stay profitable in this persistent gameworld. Ventura Inc is an economic simulation MMO that aims to be challenging, fun, competitive and a game where you team with your friends.

name: Venari
summary: Discover what happened to an old ruin and rumors of a large beast roaming the wood.

name: Vertigo FPS
summary: VertigoFPS is first person shooter game. Player is able to "leap" to any side of the wall or floor and have got total vertigo in the head. This allow player to experiment with point of view and with perspective in this game.

name: Versailles 1685
summary:
Stop a conspiracy to sabotage Louis XIV's rule, as you explore and adventure your way through 1685 Versailles.

The game was a commercial success, with sales of 500,000 units in Europe alone by 2000.

name: Vended
summary: Even the most familiar halls seem foreign once you are left in them alone. The sounds, smells, lighting, all seem recognizable, but wrong... or maybe its something else? dive in, test your courage and learn the truth in this unique short single player experience.

name: Venice Taxi Boats
summary:
In Venice Taxi Boats you will be tasked with successfully navigating the maze that is this famous city’s canal system!
Pilot one of the many boats as you admire the view! Visit famous landmarks including Rialto Bridge, Murano Island & San Marco Square. With 50 missions of increasing complexity and difficulty, you will start out slow, but will have to learn the ropes of being a captain quickly.

name: Vex: World 4 Unlock
summary: Unlocks World 4!

name: Venture
summary: A strategy game with a medieval/pirate theme for the Xbox Live Marketplace.

name: Vexperience - B.E.T.H. & Vecsports Boxing
summary: Compilation.

name: Veloz
summary: How far can you go stepping deep on the gas running straight through the intensively traffic streets of a city?

name: Vermilion Arcade: Horror Collection
summary: Vermilion Arcade is a collection of 8+ horror games inside a surreal and mysterious arcade.

name: Vektor 2089
summary: A fast paced intense futuristic hovercar racing game.

name: Velocity Vector
summary: Velocity Vector grants you a chance to challange your VR gaming skills in a form of a fast paced action/platformer/racing game. You jump on platforms, you drift through the race track, you fly in tunnels!

name: Velocidevorium
summary: The ultimate casual 3D snakelike with perpetually morphing claymation levels.

name: Verbal Verdict
summary: In Verbal Verdict you're a novice investigator in 1950's Brooklyn, solving crimes and climbing the ranks by interrogating suspects and solving problems in a detective game powered by artificial intelligence.

name: Vector Wave
summary: Drop-in, pick-up powerful weapons and blast your friends into the void in this 2.5D party platform shooter, where the bullets don’t hurt, but the knockback does!

name: Velocity Skytacks
summary: A Fun Arcady Low Poly Split Screen Multiplayer Racing Game

name: Verzeus
summary: Blast and weave your way through enemy fire while managing a wide variety of ship power-ups in this retro style horizontal shoot-'em-up!

name: Velnor's Lair
summary: Earth is in trouble from the Black Wizard Velnor, as he has finally found the tomb of Grako to turn himself into a demon. Time is short as he prepares for the change and so instead of sending a huge army to stop him, you have been chosen for this quest. You have arrived at Mt. Elk and you must enter the mountain and find Velnor hidden in the Goblin Labyrinth to stop his evil plan.

name: Velocity Ventures
summary: Embark on a thrilling platforming adventure in 'Velocity Ventures.' With bow and arrow combat system, 20 levels ranging with different difficulties, speedrun mode, and global leaderboards, test your skills and claim your spot at the top!

name: Vektor Tank
summary: Vektor Tank is a tank combat game that channels the spirit of the early '90s into one delightfully awkward-looking game. It features big polygons, endless, flat expanses, and robots.

name: Veneficium: A witch's tale
summary: Veneficium is a cute and magical 3D platformer in which you help Alice uncover the faith of her coven. Alice has to use her magic to interact with different objects within a vast and magical world to overcome puzzles and obstacles.

name: Veil of the Skies
summary: Embark on an emotionally charged journey through the ruins of a war-torn world in "Veil of the Skies"; a gripping narrative-driven adventure that explores the resilience of civilians amidst chaos and devastation.

name: Vengeful Bat Dungeon Crawler
summary: A short adventure RPG where you play as a bat, a rat, and a wolf, and descend into a multi-level dungeon in order to get revenge on the humans that murdered your family! Instead of playing as heroes in a typical RPG you assume the role of the monsters they fought along the way.

name: Vessel Blue
summary: In this Point & Click Puzzle Horror Game, you sit at a desk trying to solve puzzles using your old computer, whilst being hunted by a terrifying monster. You can’t run away or walk in this game; you are stuck to your chair!

name: Veni, Vidi, Vici
summary: Dispel the world's corruption by befriending magical creatures through rhythm-based dance combat!

name: Veterinary Clinic Simulator
summary: Play as a veterinarian whose job is to save the lives of various animals. During the game, to save your patients, you will have to be observative and react quickly to various events. The fate of the animals is in your hands!

name: Vengeance of the Chicken
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Ed Day as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Vector HD
summary: Vector is an exciting, arcade-style game featuring you as the exceptional free runner who won’t be held down by the system. The game opens with a view into a totalitarian world where freedom and individually is nothing more than a distant dream. But the heart of a freerunner is strong, and you soon break free. Run, vault, slide and climb using extraordinary techniques based on the urban ninja sport of Parkour all while being chased by Big Brother who's sole purpose is to capture you and bring you back.

name: Vectopia
summary:
Unlike the previous Vecmania, which comprised seven full games and two demos, the majority of Vectopia is composed of unfinished demos and only three full games. 
 
In order to cycle through the games, once the menu screen appears after power-up, the player must press button one on the Vectrex controller, then to play a game they must press button four 
 
Games in Vectopia: 
- Wormhole 
- Trakkers 
- Vectropolis 500 (demo) 
- Spike's Water Balloons 
- Control Test (demo) 
- Mad Planetoid Test Wk (demo) 
- Star Fire Early Work (demo) 
- Star Fire Early Work II (demo) 
- Star Fury Test Work 
- Trivia

name: VectorField
summary: VectorField is a game that goes back to basics. In the days of slot machines in the 80s. Take control of a super car and become the best racer in the world.

name: Veterum
summary: Turn-based tactical strategy with a detailed combat system and interactive environment. Explore the open world, complete quests, search for rare artifacts. Lead the last army of the Order of the Gatekeepers and stop the coming chaos!

name: VeggieTales: LarryBoy and the Bad Apple
Verne World
summary: Verne World is a role-playing game exclusively released in Japan. The game revolves around the main character being trapped in a theme park based around the works of Jules Verne such as 'A Journey to the Center of the Earth' and 'Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea'.

name: Velarune
summary: Explore a seamless and colorful world while being hunted by a cosmic wolf in this beautiful third-person adventure game. Uncover the scarred past of Velarune by solving puzzles and collecting relics. Discover the secrets of this secluded land before time runs out…

name: Vector Born
summary: Vector Born is an arcade bullet-hell style game. Blast through waves of unique enemies. Collect powerful upgrades. Destroy everything that stands in your way. Local coop. Controller Support. 4 Levels. Several playable ships. Weapon upgrades. Settings control. Much more to come!

name: Verdant Skies
summary: A life simulation game targeted to those who grew up with Harvest Moon.

name: Vespera_Hotel
summary: Welcome to Vespera Hotel! Please observe the precautions on manager's letter and greet our dear guests with your smile.

name: Verzerk
summary: Verzerk is a hack of Berzerk, adding speech this time around, with a robotic voice welcoming the player during the attract mode, then states "this is Verzerk". The phrases from the original arcade version of "shoot him", "chicken, fight like a robot", "got you humanoid", etc. are included in this release. The game plays identically to Berzerk though, aside from that and only being for one player.

name: Vertical Slice
summary: You are Grace Liang -- experienced game producer -- dropped into the disastrous project that is Agency. Through all the flawed ideas, bugs, and bad tempers, you will see the ups and downs of game development firsthand. Will the team succeed in making the greatest game of all time, or will they fail to deliver on their blockbuster hit?

name: Versailles II: Testament of the King
summary:
The game is set in 1700, 15 years after the previous game, at the time of the death of King Charles II. The player assumes the role of Charles-Louis de Farevolles, who turns up at the Court of Louis XIV, with neither influence at Court nor money.

A 25 piece orchestra, led by Skip Sempé, performs an hour of music for the game.

name: Vespers
summary: A piece of interactive fiction written by Jason Devlin.

name: Venox: The Alien Survivors
summary: You are a Venox who invades planets to explore and mine for mech parts to merge with. You must repair and protect your ship from enemy waves while doing so. Venox is half alien and half mecha, but stronger than both!

name: Vector Prospector
summary: Blast through generated worlds! The carefully designed caves of Vector Prospector are completely unique every time you play. The caves are a dangerous test of your wits... and your skills. Can you collect the five green gems and escape alive?

name: Vestige
summary: Vestige is a walk among ruin.

name: Vertex Rush
summary: Vertex Rush - A Fast-Paced Climbing Adventure!

name: Vector Runner
summary: Use the arrow keys to steer. Avoid the obstacles and collect the powerups for points, shield power, and invincibility. P will pause the game, but also incur a 250 point penalty.

name: Vektron Revenge
summary: Vektron Revenge is an old school style shooter done exclusively for VR. The playfield has no limits as you will be avoiding and destroying waves of geometric enemies in a 360 environment.

name: Very Pink Game
summary: Play as Ivy, a lonely little girl living in a very pink town who has received a letter from her dear old friend. Ivy must find items and complete a series of tasks in order to see her again. Includes many ghosts, trees, a convenience store, a narcoleptic ghost hunter, and a punk who's in love with a donut witch.

name: Vector Bias
summary: Pilot your Vector through hostile procedurally generated environments in this fast-paced action-roguelite. Battle enemies and conquer bosses to reach the heart of the robotic army that has subjugated the earth. Good luck!

name: Venus One: Galactic Overlords
summary: Outwit or perish in VOGO, a thrilling turn-based strategy game. In every move, you have a chance to surround more territory and destroy more structures than your opponent. But be careful, because every move can also be a trap. Outsmart your rival and claim victory in VOGO!

name: Velha Quântica
summary: A digital version of quantum tic-tac-toe with old ladies and cats as theme.

name: Vesna
summary: Vesna is an indie made fantasy, turn-based game. Made using Unreal Engine.

name: Vesta: Limited Edition
summary:
Set in a highly technological universe, with Vesta you will again feel the challenge of traditional puzzle games mixed with more arcade elements, all within a very elaborate and fascinating story.

Gears, robots, mystery, humour, challenges, fun and action … Vesta is that, and much more.

The Limited Edition of Vesta includes:

- Vesta Collector’s Box
- Vesta Game Disc
- Vesta Game Manual
- Vesta Art Book & Comic (32 pages)
- Vesta Original Soundtrack
- Vesta Numbered Certificate

name: Veneficium
summary: Stay quiet. Stay hidden. Watch your steps. If you don't, run. Play as Abigail in her quest to find her grandmother in a cursed forest. Use your spellcasting abilities to hide from various dangers. Will you survive the night?

name: Vexius
summary: Vexius is a puzzle platform game with an interesting movement mechanic. Roll or dash your way past obstacles and hazards in the included levels. When feeling creative you can create your own levels with the editor and share them with the world!

name: Verdant Citadel
summary: Verdant Citadel is a single-level PK3 for Doom II using the GZDoom source port that was released in May 2019. It was designed by Dennis Meuwissen (Exl) and uses the music track "Cit﻿y of Ruins" and "Titan" by KhydroDjent﻿. Verdant Citadel won one of the Cacowards in 2019.

name: Vecter Assault
summary: Vecter Assault is an action packed multiplayer sci-fi shooter game. Battle against your opponents in unique 360 degree environments and diverse battlegrounds to be the last man standing or with the most number of kills.

name: Vectris
summary: Vectris is your typical blocks and lines type puzzle game. The game is complete however, it does suffer from some screen flicker. A Vectrex side effect of drawing too many vectors on screen at once

name: Very Dungeon
summary: Very Dungeon is a single-screen roguelike game with infinite levels. Play as 1 of 2 characters as you try to escape a dungeon filled with mysteries and danger!

name: Vertical Fall
summary: Easy. And freedom air. But, this wing does not flutter.

name: Vec Sports Boxing
summary:
Vec Sports Boxing has both a one player mode and a two player mode.

In one player mode, the player controls a boxer who is training to become the top fighter. The player's coach will call out commands and the player will have to mimic those commands. Accuracy is important and if the player make a wrong move then he will have to start the training session over again.

In two player mode, the players control boxers who are sparring. Each player is trying to wear the other's stamina down and knock them out first. The first to win two rounds wins the match.

name: VersaillesVR | the Palace is yours
summary: "Versailles: The Palace is yours" offers you a unique visit to the palace built by Louis XIV. Paintings, sculptures, furniture, the Hall of Mirrors – everything is within your reach as you have unlimited access to the treasures of Versailles. Happy exploring! Realized in collaboration with Google Arts & Culture.

name: Vegas Royal Jackpot CSS
summary:
Spin the best free slots games, compete in leagues, join clubs and hit Jackpot.
In our huuge casino. Spin Slot machines and win Huuuge Jackpot starting with a welcome bonus of 5,000 In-Game Coins! What are you waiting for? All Hail the New Las Vegas Casino Game Ultimate Experience! Vegas Royal Jackpot Party Casino is here to fulfill your Wild Dreams, Winner at Billionaire Casino!

name: Veil of Maia
summary: Help Otu, a humble warrior monk, save a world consumed by fear in this heart-wrenching Metroidvania. Slash, cast, and use telekinesis to defeat disillusioned enemies and conquer epic boss battles! Transcend through dozens of hand-crafted trials to overcome fear itself and lift the Veil of Maia.

name: Verkehrsspiele 2
summary: The second of the CSV Video-Traffic Games. The CSV Video-Traffic Games Edition of the G7000 was given to primary schools in a small region of West Germany. The package consisted of a G7000 and two special games -- Verkehrsspiele 1 and Verkehrsspiele 2 -- that were used to teach children how to behave on the street. The console set is nothing more than a repackaging of a regular Philips G7000. The package comes with a special "Video-Traffic Games" sticker affixed to the TV screen depicted by the box art. It contains a regular G7000, the two games, and some documentation. The first volume of the traffic games was also given away to members of the German Commander-ROM club as Videopac "V," and retitled Kinder im Verkehr 1 (Kids in Traffic 1). The manual claims that Videopac V was the first of a series of new learning games aimed at kids 6 to 14 years old. From this, one might surmise that "Kinder im Verkehr 2" was planned for release, but no copies have been found. In all forms, the traffic games are quite rare, with Videopac V being a bit less difficult to find than the Verkehrsspiele games.

name: VeggieTales: LarryBoy and the Bad Apple
summary: The action-adventure game features LarryBoy, the popular plunger-headed crime-fighting cucumber featured in several best-selling videos, in his quest to save the citizens of Bumblyburg from temptation. When trouble appears, the citizens of Bumblyburg call world-famous crime fighter LarryBoy! Aided only by his trusted butler Alfred (played with zest by Archibald Asparagus), LarryBoy is everything that his alter-ego Larry the Cucumber is not: bold... confident... relentlessly driven... brazenly heroic! Well, actually, that's not entirely true. While he tries to create this impression, inside, LarryBoy is still plain-old Larry. LarryBoy attempts to save the day with clever use of his super-suction ears and the many features of the Larry-Mobile. Call him a kinder, gentler, slightly slower superhero!

name: Vertigo
summary: When exploring your house feels just like exploring space.

name: Vesper: Zero Light Edition
summary:
Thousands of years after the activation of the Vesper Protocol, a small android crosses a fallen world, hunted by merciless machines, to control the power of Light.

Vesper is a visionary adventure taking place in a decaying world full of puzzles and mysteries to uncover, where your choices will change the future of an entire race.

Seven is a small android, lost on an eerie planet full of perils and traces of an ancient civilization - with no powers and no ability to defeat enemies until he finds the Drive Gun, a weapon used to absorb lights, create darkness, and control minds.

name: Very Iconic Pixels - 80s Quiz
summary:
Put your 80s knowledge to the test with the VIP 80s retro pixel quiz!
We’re taking you time-travelling in the DeLorean back to the world of 80s music, movies, TV and sport, where you’ll identify iconic pixel-art characters to score stars and progress along the Hollywood Walk of Fame.

name: Vertigo: Remastered
summary: Vertigo Remastered is a top-to-bottom reworking of the original 2016 VR game featuring new visuals and, crucially, many of gameplay updates seen in the upcoming Vertigo 2.

name: Vega Conflict: Exterminator Pack
summary: Exterminator Destroyers are a highly sought-after hull for base sniping and PvE Outpost combat. Their tremendous range is boosted even further by the Xeno Shatter Driver. Any base you want to destroy? Destroy it.

name: Venaitura
summary: A retro RPG wherein you assemble a party of 4 Heroes from 12 Classes and embark on a journey to rid the world of Tsufana from the titular tower's corruption.

name: Veronikka's To-Do
summary:
You cannot go back, there is no way to ignore it, no matter how difficult and gross it is…. If it is written in the To-Do, it must be done. Because that's why you created the list, to do your daily chores, such as watering the plants or going to pay your debts!

Interact with the inhabitants of "That Place", live a day in the life of a 16-year-old girl while she completes her chores, has fun with her friends and goes to the mall!

You can just do the chores and rest, or meanwhile discover what is Esther hiding in her basement!

name: Vectrexit
summary: Maze game where the player has to get to the exit within a given time without touching borders while the maze changes its shape. Gadgets can help you achieve this goal.

name: Vera Swings
summary: Swing through the sky and to the moon in this challenging platformer

name: Vergilius
summary: Hot searing pain gives way to intense flashes of red and black. Falling through a sea of blood surrounded by the howling voices of the past, you begin to panic. Then suddenly you hit something, hard but painless, and your vision blurs and fades. Hours, or days pass until you awaken somewhere strange…

name: Vectorio: Frosted Defenses Pack
summary:
Celebrate the Holidays with the new Frosted Defenses pack!
The pack includes the following cosmetics from The Armory...

- Frosted Turret skin
- Frosted Shotgunner skin
- Frosted Ranger skin
- Frosted Pulser skin
- Frosted Minigun skin
- Frosted death effect
- Frosted bullet effect

name: Venice Mystery
summary: Pair up and match colorful tiles to clear over 700 levels and solve an ancient mystery. Gather special power-ups that will help you on your travel through the city of Venice, one of Italy's most interesting cities. Can you find the thirteen lost paintings from the past that hide a well hidden secret and repair the old machine to save the historical city from its nemesis? Get an extra bonus by destroying as many tiles as possible in one rush and collect coins to buy extras. Use joker and other special power-ups, unlock certain hidden areas on the play field by unlocking pyramid cover stones and find all hidden keys on the play field to finish your round.

name: Velucity
summary: VELUCITY, a rhythm game with a new feel, is released in Steam through Early Access! Enjoy the game with a keyboard that anyone can easily start with.

name: Vesper: Ether Saga
summary: The perfect union between video games and comics.

name: Velocity VR Battle Royal
summary: Spawn into my simulation, fight for your life until one remains. Destroy everything in your path, slice all in your way, climb into action, and punch out the competition.

name: Vector Space
summary: It is a game about switching squares to make board full

name: Venus in Furs: Sensual Pleasure
summary: Hardpunch's Venus is alone in her temple of love, pleasure, and sex. She knows that the world we know no longer exists. Now, she remains a recluse in her palace and anyone who dares to steal her precious gifts will be punished with explicit and savage sex. This invader will become her sex slave...

name: Versus: Boys and Girls
summary: Girls versus Boys is a world-wide challenge to once and for all decide which gender is king-of-the-hill. Play as either Girl or Boy and gather points to improve your team score.

name: Veg out Crew FPS
summary: You are Carro, the lone carrot on a mission to take back the Veg out World from all the moldy fruits and vegetables. Make sure your locked and loaded for some fun, old school, retro, shooter action.

name: VeggieTales: Veggie Carnival
summary: Join in the grand opening of the Veggie Carnival, where kids play five hilarious carnival games with the Veggies and win loads of tickets. Aim for a high score in Dartguns in Dodge or take a wild ride in Bumper Clickers. Watch the wacky Veggie robots sing silly songs. Clown around by dressing up your favorite Veggies in hats, wigs, and funny clothes. When you've earned enough tickets, climb aboard the Bobbereeno for a thrilling roller coaster ride with--who else--the Veggies.

name: VectorMan Classic
summary: The port of Vectorman for smart devices. It features additional features such as leaderboards.

name: Vector Velocity
summary: In Vector Velocity movement is the name of the game. Run, Jump, Slide, Climb, Grind, Skid, Zipline and ultimately race your way from point A to B as fast as you can.

name: Veggy World
summary: Veggy World, an action game in which you control a strawberry-shaped spaceship that flies through broccoli-covered landscapes and turnip tree houses. Fire lasers and blue pellets at a steady wave of fruit and vegetable creatures, causing the personified food to explode in a bright burst. The depiction is mostly whimsical, though you do see their "kill percentage" tallied on menu screens at the end of each round. Game customized for each target platform.

name: Veggies War
summary: Veggies War - Top Down shooter game in which you have to shoot back from enemies in the form of vegetables, under your control a piece of bread, armed with a special gun and which from room to room learns new abilities!

name: Vega Conflict: Exodus Pack
summary: Jump start your epic war in space with the Exodus Pack! Buy now and get Exodus Cruisers! These ships will make a fine armada for any new rebel.

name: Velocity 2X: Dual Core DLC Pack
summary:
So those last few levels tickled your gamer hindbrain? Then it's time for Dual Core.

Control two Quarp Jets at once to weave, blast and race through 10 mind-melting levels at the heart of Paroika Prime, the Vokh Citadel.

Master these levels to upgrade your essential motor neurons, enhance your stimulus processing and gain a deeper capacity for intense spatial challenge.

name: Vertical Mayhem
summary: A public domain port of Sega's Columns coin-op.

name: Veteran
summary: Rail-shooter in Operational Wolf style.

name: Velocity Stream
summary:
In Velocity Stream one player takes control over the Paver, a spacecraft that flies through the game world, leaving a trail of energy in its wake.
It's on this trail that the other players race each other. The Pavers goal is to create a road so difficult that the other players fall too far behind and get eliminated, while the Racers aim is to be the first to catch up with the Paver. To create more exciting and difficult tracks, the Paver can pick up powerups in the surroundings, including narrow roads and obstacles.

name: Vermilion Desert
summary: Vermilion Desert is a military strategy title, published by Riverhillsoft, which was released in Japan in 1999 for Sega Dreamcast.

name: Verdict: Descent
summary: Establish your written character in a world of many. Roleplay with others in the city of Galvia, exploring six Courts with distinct themes and mechanics. Along the way, meet other characters that you'll have to befriend or battle!

name: Verlore Tyd en Drome Bundle
summary: Two abstract, ethereal worlds collide in this mysterious bundle, prepare yourself to be taken to 2 distinct realms that blend interpretive design and human curiosity into a unique combination of platforming, puzzles and challenges.

name: VectorBall
summary: A time-traveling, dimension-shifting, mind-bending roguelike game. Guided by the enigmatic AI, Vector, you'll delve into the fabric of existence, traversing ancient ruins and future realms. Every playthrough brings new challenges, insights, and hidden truths. Dare to redefine your reality?

name: Versus World
summary: Welcome to Versus World! Shoot, stab, snipe, and 'splode your opponents to victory in this fast-paced multiplayer FPS. Here, the afterlife of a respawning immortal is seasoned by an up-down crouch.

name: Vex Blocks
summary: “Vex Blocks” is the easy-to-play, exciting and addictive block game. Match up blocks by symbol and/or color to draw the longest chain of lightning possible. Draw lightning chains on your screen to surround and neutralize bomb blocks before they explode or to capture power-ups and increase your coin count. Collect coins to unlock new game modes or to gear up with unique power-ups like the Black Hole, X-Block or Nuke to help you along the way. Challenge your friends to beat your score and earn more coins, or team up and take on our score trials together!

name: Veil
summary: Demon-powered tactical FPS.

name: Verjaded
summary: A song paints a thousand words

name: Veiled
summary: Complete the ritual on your path to redemption.

name: Venti Mesi
summary: A collection of playable stories about Italian Resistance and Liberation from Nazi-Fascism.

name: Vexation: Hand Crafted Hell
summary: Vexation is the rage game to end all rage games. Every level is a different genre and art style all packaged within their own little pockets of hand crafted hell. Who will be the first to overcome this impossible challenge? That is, if anyone ever does...

name: Vetrex
summary: Vetrex is a game for two in which you will compete with your friend for the winning place using different types of weapons, throwing grenades and dropping red exploding barrels on the enemy's head!

name: Versus.
summary: Versus. is a turn-based multiplayer shooter made in the Unreal Engine 5 aspects. Play in a 1 vs 1 or a 2 vs 2 with or against your friends! Try to survive and be the best at the end!

name: Vermillion Watch: Moorgate Accord
summary: Who broke the agreement between good and evil, and what's prowling the London streets?

name: Vector Race
summary: Vector Race is a racing game set in a surreal setting. A colorful track with electronic music. Reach the end of the race with the fastest time. Compete with your friends who will be on the leaderboard.

name: Vermillion Watch: Order Zero
summary: Someone’s been stealing rare antiques! As you begin your investigation, you quickly find that there’s something much larger at play than just petty theft. It’s time to team up with new friends and catch the culprits terrorizing London! Do you have what it takes to save the city in time? Find out in this gripping hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

name: Veil of the Volcano
summary: Create a tribe to survive the natural disasters of the island. Prepare your community for the day the volcano blows. You'll need to survive until the Spring when life returns.

name: Veg Out Crew
summary: A simple arcade game, old school, pixel art graphics and just a good fun game! Oh and it's also got different fruit and veg characters for you to choose from. Lots of weapons, enemies, traps, levels, you know how it is, get in and get gaming!

name: Velhokissa Kloridi Klaviatuuri ja Kadonneet Aakkoset
Vehicle Simulator
summary:
Vehicle Simulator is an open world flying/sailing simulator with accurate physics and dynamics, simulating well the various boats, planes and land vehicles included.
The game allows the user to modify and experiment with scenery making and vehicle design by way of extreme modability, with a large library of existing mods and add-ons.

name: Venus Senki
summary: Venus Senki is a Strategy game, developed by Human Entertainment and published by Varie, which was released in Japan in 1989.

name: Vehicular Rampage
summary: Strap in, start your engine, and get ready to start your rampage! Tear through multiple interesting locations that are packed with fun easter eggs, all while tearing through hoards of terrified pedestrians. Revel in a retro visual style and feel while enjoying modern driving physics and controls!

name: Venus & Braves: Majo to Megami to Horobi no Yogen
summary: The PSP remake of Venus & Braves, released January 20, 2011. The remake features cameos from characters of Namco Bandai's RPGs - the Tales of series and Xenosaga.

name: Velkyn
summary: Embark on a unique journey and uncover the secrets of the floating island of Vynary and other locations. Velkyn is an immersive open world adventure with a focus on combat, exploration, and puzzles.

name: Venture Within
summary: In Venture Within, a deep-sea roguelite game, you take on the role of Alice Tharp as she enters magically altered hydrothermal vent towers where she must battle against strange creatures and avoid natural hazards to find her mother and her lost research team.

name: Versus in the Dark
summary: Up to 4 players intense duels, Free4all or team play, Online and Local !Hide and unleash the fury of your lightsaber katana to survive in this high-speed, one-hit-kill platform fighter where everyone's invisible!

name: Verses of Enchantment
summary: A magical card game where you duel wizards using AI generated poetry. Travel a rich world, meet fellow wizards, collect cards and build a deck that will inspire enchanting poetry!

name: Veilslash
summary: In this action adventure, generate and phase terrain with various tools. Carry a massive communication device to the apex of an alien planet, but don't drop it. It's a long way down...

name: Vertigo
summary: A fast-paced multiplayer racing game for the Xbox Live Indie Marketplace.

name: Vee Rethak: Deep Under the Mountain
summary: Vee Rethak is a VR dungeon crawler in the vein of Rogue and NetHack featuring random procedural dungeons, permadeath, sword fighting and a physical skill based magic system (movements are needed to cast a spell)

name: Veggie Panino Tactics
summary: This is an experiment to take the most ridiculous title I could and make a cool story about it. It turns out that story is about the war of vegetables versus meat! It's an interactive story that you control with wasd or arrow keys. There are three different endings to find... This game was created for Wizardjam 6.

name: Vectonic
summary: Jumping, zooming and stomping in a neon demo-derby.

name: Vehicle! Vehicle! Vehicle!!!
summary: It's slipping through! Blow it up! Go for the world rank in the best vehicle! Vehicle! Vehicle! Vehicle!!! is a real 3D battle run game that is easy to operate and exhilarating.

name: Vernon's Legacy
summary: Vernon's Legacy is an horror adventure with an enigmatic story that takes place nearly a century ago. You are playing as Robert, the new owner of Dunkenhof manor.

name: Veer
summary:
Use relative teleportation and the ability to change the direction of gravity to progress through the temple, where everything revolves around the core experience of puzzle solving.

Do you have what it takes?

name: VeniVidiFutzi
