summary: Large greek-themed medieval town with a venice-style canal and cavern areas beneath. It also features a few new and modified monsters: crossbow knights, skeletons and Granito.

name: Vermin Hunter
summary: Have fun hunting down the vermin who are destroying the farmers crops and lively hood.

name: Vetka
summary: Vetka is a Pipe Dream variant. The puzzle task is to connect each burgeon on the grid field to the live branch by adjusting and turning other branches scattered around. There are six levels of difficulty, which differ by size of the puzzle.

name: VehiCraft
summary: This is a vehicle sandbox crafting game that you can build different ground vehicles to fight other vehicles. This game gives the maximum freedom for object placement and customisation for your vehicle.

name: Vegetables Deluxe C64
summary: A vegetable-themed Match 3 puzzle game for Commodore 64 machines and emulators.

name: Vertical Collapse: Ghost in the Machine
summary: Vertical Collapse is a digital pinball game with an inverted twist.

name: Venture II
summary:
Venture II was created by Tim Snider as a sequel to the classic game Venture. Only 24 copies of Venture II were produced. The first four carts were part of a pre-production run so Tim could get the manufacturing process fine tuned. Those first four are marked with Greek letters on the label. Tim then created 20 numbered copies of Venture II which he made available privately at the 2001 Classic Gaming Expo. One copy of Venture II sold at the CGE2K1 auction and went for over $200. Tim created perhaps the most extravagant packaging seen for a self-published title at the time--the game was delivered in a hand-crafted, miniature treasure chest, which opened to reveal the cartridge (with numbered label) and a manual, surrounded by elegant, gold leaf paper.

If you'd like to purchase a copy of Venture II (sans the fancy treasure chest packaging), you can do so in the AtariAge Store. Included is a beautifully illustrated twelve page manual by Dale Crum.

name: VEmpire - The Kings of Darkness
summary: VEmpire - The Kings of Darkness is a vampire themed digital deck-building game, inspired by one of history's most influential royal dynasties - the house of Habsburg.

name: Verso
summary: Alternate between real and mirror world avoiding the monster to escape the inn.

name: Vector TD
summary: Vector TD is a vector-themed tower defense game. Place your towers strategically and eliminate the incoming enemies.

name: Versus Go
summary: Welcome to Versus GO! Versus GO is a shooter game with a 3rd person camera angle that you can play over Lan or with bots. It is a shooter game where you can compete against your enemies in multiple game modes and game maps.

name: Very Scary Gays
summary: A queer-centric dating sim featuring a wild cast of human-ish men.

name: Vehicle Cavalier
summary: Fast-paced gun-blazing action awaits in this classic mecha deathmatch. Blast your way through the arena as you wield over 300 types of weapons. You can even create your own weapons for custom carnage! Explore the madness as 8 unique characters are locked in a mobile-suite melee. Conquer all challenges and build the most powerful Vehicle Cavalier ever!

name: Vertiginous Golf
summary: Vertiginous Golf is a dystopian steam punk mini golf adventure game set in the skies above an alternate world where life on the ground is enveloped in permanent smog, constant darkness and never-ending rain.

name: Vermis Orbita
summary: Vermis Orbita is a fast-paced, wave based, action game where you control a Dragon-God who has the power to utilize orbiting objects as weaponry to fight off swarms of enemies.

name: Venture Forth
summary: Venture Forth is an extremely challenging adventure game with a retro 90s shooter vibe. Forge your own path within its labyrinthine caves but beware the danger lurking around every corner.

name: VEV: Viva Ex Vivo - VR Edition
Veins
summary: A malignancy spreads through her veins.

name: Vectorman
summary: Vectorman for the PlayStation 2 is an unreleased reboot of the Vectorman series (consisting of Vectorman and Vectorman 2 for the Sega Mega Drive) developed by Pseudo Interactive for Sega.

name: Vectaria.io
summary: Multiplayer browser game in block style, where you can build houses, craft various items, digging dungeons and mines, trade with players and much more!

name: Veinless Property
summary:
Veinless Property is a cell shaded horror game based on a home invasion in the style of Junji Ito.

This Game is one of 3 Games made in a 3 week long GameJam by Triality Games.

name: Version Control
summary: Experimental increpare game.

name: Verti-Go Home!
summary:
Verti-Go Home! is an endless runner, set in a 90s Space Western Universe.
You fly through (and above) a tunnel, that you steer with your head, to avoid collisions with bizarre and dangerous obstacles. This is VR. The doors of perception are open.

If you think you have seen it all.... Enjoy the ride or Verti-Go Home!

name: Vegas Dream
summary: Bring a casino to your living room! Up to four high-rollers can play Blackjack, Roulette, Keno, or Slot Machines. Odds are you’re going to love Vegas Dream!

name: Vegas Girls
summary:
Vegas Girls on CD-i is a gambling game.
5 Las Vegas casino games for you to play, at any time, and when you win, the girl of your choice removes an item of clothing.

name: Vest A Life
summary: The world is finally in an unreturnable condition. war, chemicals, nuclear, global warming, and widespread plastic pollution causing problems that are too late to fix, and now all humanity pays the price for it. Play as a survivor in Post-apocalypse 'Phuket'. Find resources in the MMO world of VAL.

name: Venom Spirit
summary: Venom Spirit is a cancelled action adventure that was in development for Super Nintendo around 1994 by the Pickford Bros, while they were working at Software Creations and after publishing their cult-classic Plok. The game was planned to use pre-rendered 3D graphics on the 16-Bit console, somehow similar to what Rare also did with their Donkey Kong Country series. While Venom Spirit was never officially announced by the company, many details about the project were shared online by John and Ste Pickford.

name: Vein Hotel
summary:
"Vein Hotel" 3D horror game, let's feel the fear!

Travelling is fun. One night, when I woke up, I found myself in a strange place, it was a very different hotel, and I began to explore where I was and escaped.
Why I am here? It must has some reasons .

name: Velocity
summary: Velocity is a shoot 'em up involving navigating the Quarp Jet: a teleporting spacecraft – through space, whilst avoiding and defeating enemies using bombs that can be flung in cardinal directions. The main goal of the game is to rescue stranded ships.

name: Vertical Quest
summary: Climb the treacherous tower in Vertical Quest, a challenging rogue-like game where you control a hero, overcome obstacles, and defeat the ultimate boss at the top!

name: Venus Flytraps
summary:
Let's grow a cute carnivorous plant!
Simulation game "Flytrap" is a game that you grow it to eat the insects to Dionaea muscipula.
I eat Flycatcher may extend when you tap the stage.
To fit the timing in insects to move, so you Saseyo eat!
I grow more and more Dionaea muscipula eat lots of insects.
Would to any growth?

name: Venator
summary: Dive into a retro Action RPG odyssey set in ancient Rome. As Titus, hunt spectral evils in a quest for revenge. Sail the haunted Mediterranean, face mythical monsters, and unravel mysteries from beyond the veil. A storm of vengeance brews; Rome's shadows beckon you forth.

name: Vegetable Crash
summary: Use your fork shooting ship to fight off hordes of eggplants, carrots and apple, in Vegetable Crash, a Galaxian/Galaga clone

name: Venusville
summary: Guide pioneering settlers among Venusian clouds in this space colonisation city builder. Grow food, collect energy, mine resources, balance buoyancy and weight to stay afloat in the treacherous Venusian atmosphere, and build a self-sufficient colony while navigating storms and acidic clouds.

name: Vector Assault
summary: Vector Assault is a fast paced twin stick shooter where you have to survive a onslaught of enemy attackers.

name: Vee is Calling
summary: Visual novel game about a video call date.

name: Version Three: Invisible Raid
summary: Authentic Customizable Mech Action Game. Customize the combat mech "V3" and run through the battlefield!

name: Velocimom
summary: Collect as many snacks as you can without getting caught by Velocimom!

name: Vector Zone
summary: In Vector Zone you see yourself stuck in a world ravaged by an apocalyptic outbreak, humanity struggles to survive amidst a relentless horde of zombies.

name: Vectorium
summary: Vectorium is a simple, minimalistic shooter where you have to destroy all enemies while avoiding their threatening attacks. Can you survive those dreadful enemies and barrage of gunfire?

name: Velocity Legends: Action Racing Game
summary: Immerse yourself in one of the arcade action racing games, stunning visual and particle effects and epic action that turn every race into a real blockbuster race movie.

name: Vempire
summary:
Vempire is a puzzle game with added strategy and story elements to entrance gamers. At its heart Vempire is a puzzle game in which the player has to rotate squares of blocks (clockwise or counter-clockwise) with the aim to create rows or columns of four of more blocks of the same type. When this happens those blocks are destroyed and more blocks falls from the top. The aim of each level is to delete enough blocks before the time runs out.

The game features 10 worlds, with each world divided into four levels, a boss monster to face at the end of each world. You must make careful use of your moves in each level, as blocks can be of various types. Some contain mana energy of different colors or money. Money collected during the game can be spent in the shop to buy new creatures to summon during the game. Doing mana combos the player can summon creatures that will help the player delete the blocks. The game feature 6 different creatures that the player has to unlock spending money in the shop. Through gameplay challenges in each world, players can gains special artifacts that give you various powers, such as slowing down time or turning the blocks into mana you need.

name: Vermin
summary: A port of Vermin released in Game Boy Gallery.

name: Vertex Dispenser
summary: Vertex Dispenser is an abstract real-time strategy game with mathematical puzzle elements. Move around a geometric surface and lay claim to your territory. Protect it by capturing solid faces for defense. Manipulate the colours of your vertices to gain power for special abilities. Balance your time between attacking, defending, expanding and colouring to survive and defeat your enemies.

name: Velocity.io
summary:
Join the battle, choose your drive and survive as long as possible ! Develop your strategy, Blast your opponents, collect speed modifiers to maintain your speed !
Try to survive in the battle as long as you can by taking down your opponents and stealing their fuel! Unlock new Cars with various skins! Complete various achievements to show off your skills!

name: Vertigo
summary: A physics-based rock climbing simulator.

name: Velberan In Miracle World
summary: In this adventure, Velberan is in search of his dog Bolt. This game is a platformer inspired by the universe of Velberan.

name: Veck
summary: Veck is an immensely fast-paced romp through fiften one-minute-long levels, with massive firepower upgrades every minute - you’re firing 1,575 bullets every second in the fifteenth minute! The upgrades aren’t enough to defeat the toughest enemies, however - you’ll have to duck and dodge some very taxing baddies if you want to get a high score.

name: Vectored Armada
summary: Build ships, break fleets. No distractions. Design ships without constraint upon your workbench, built out of destructible blocks of all shapes and sizes: hull, weapons, engines. Compose Fleets of your self-architected battle craft and obliterate the armadas of the dictator! THE OPPRESSOR MUST FALL.

name: Vessel Damage Control Trainer
summary: VESSEL Damage Control Trainer provides training on damage control skills within the interior of a simulated Arleigh Burke class destroyer. It focuses on learning objectives that directly support the Recruit Training Command curriculum and embeds training within a story that promotes score values, provides a relevant context and reinforces the culture of the service. The game reinforces decision-making, communication protocol, situational awareness and shipboard navigation. Players navigate within a virtual ship, performing typical game actions, such as opening doors, inspecting objects, collecting personal equipment, and using damage control tools. The game provides information resources and feedback designed to help students of different levels succeed.

name: Vegteria
summary: Enjoy managing your own vegetables shop . Plant, harvest, buy and sell goods, transport, drive, upgrade, customize your shop to be the best shop owner in the village.

name: Veigues Tactical Gladiator
summary: For 3 years, alien invaders have been pounding the earth into a smoldering ruin. There isn't a man alive who can stop them. But now, there's Veigues, a devastating fighting machine! Built with captured enemy technology, he's our last desperate hope for survival ... and you're in control! Trash the invaders with the Plazma Cannon! Just keep your firepower hot and fight like there's no tomorrow. Destroy the aliens or there won't be!.

name: Verwandlung
summary:
A short horror game loosely inspired by Kafka's "The Metamorphosis"
Made as part of the Haunted PS1 Halloween Jam 2022

name: Vedette
summary: You are the head of an experimental anti-crime task force in the city of Osteria. Use search history, recent emails, and criminal backgrounds to determine whether an individual is likely to commit a crime. The choices you make will have a significant impact on the entire city’s future.

name: VentureVerse: Legend of Ulora
summary: Explore, Design & Share in the land of Ulora and beyond! In single-player or online co-op, discover unique dungeons filled with exciting puzzles and combat encounters, and then create your own dungeons using the in-built level editor!

name: Venice After Dark
summary: A visual novel adventure alongside young Japanese engineer Aiko and her AI friend. Solve the mysterious case around the Stucky family and unravel what it means to be human through the eyes of an AI programmer.

name: Vent Vipers
summary: Embark on a serpentine adventure with this fast-paced, 3D snake experience. Slither through twists and turns, collecting apples to ascend to new heights. Outsmart the mazes, claim the top spot, and dive into the challenges now!

name: VegeMine
summary: Under tier upon tier of dark stratas, there grows endless vegetables, dig them, merge them, then eat them! This is a rouge-lite strategy game in which you play as a rabbit digging for vegetables, increasing your power as you advance through layers until you reach the final treasure!

name: Vektropolis
summary: Vektropolis is a first person futuristic arcade shooter coming december 2012.

name: Very Real Chess
summary: Play one of the most popular games of all time in Virtual Reality. Sharpen your skills against powerful AI, throw pieces against your opponent, or just teleport around -- all of this and more in Very Real Chess!

name: Venus Looks for Jupiter
summary:
Snort some confidence and run for your love.

A short first-person parkour game about searching for love high and low and also shooting red objects with a big, fat revolver.

name: Vectorlord
summary: In Vectorlord you play as the titular hero as you dodge & weave through the kaleidoscopic immune system of the evil INFECTOPHAGE --- an intergalactic virus siphoning precious DELTAs from the homeworld of your benefactors.

name: Vegas Prime Retrograde
summary: An episodic neo-cyberpunk thriller about former deep-space miner Clara who has to uncover a mystery with her hacking skills and make some tough decisions to find out what happened.

name: Verse Roll
summary:
Roll your ball through dangerous mazes in Verse Roll!
Feel accomplished by completing challenging levels in Solo Mode or beating your opponent's recorded time in Versus Mode!
Customize your ball and win in style!

name: Vertigo 2: Into the Aether
summary: Into the Aether is a story expansion for Vertigo 2. Embark on an interdimensional expedition to the oldest and most mysterious universe, discover new weapons and tools, and defeat fearsome new enemies.

name: Vengeful Castle
summary: Slaying enemies with swords and magic, break the endless cycle of revenge.

name: VeggieTales: Dance, Dance, Dance
summary: A modified version of Dance Praise featuring characters and music from the VeggieTales series.

name: Veilcrest: Trial of The Arcane
summary: School life in the Veilcrest Academy turned out to be more complicated than you expected. A magical world of wonder opens up as three magical men take special interest in you.

name: Venge.io
summary: Objective-based multiplayer FPS

name: Versailles Mysteries 2: The Royal Spy
summary: Let’s embark on 15 hours of thrilling detective adventures ! Take on the role of detective, privateer, engineer and strategist to foil the plans of your fiendish enemy who is out to destroy the Sun King. Explore the stunning Castle of Versailles and its surroundings on a journey punctuated with mini-games.

name: Venova Adventure
summary: Venova Adventure is a Pokémon fangame set in Venezuela. Based on its cities, legends and culture.

name: Venus Patrol
summary: Fly straight-winged jets over 1950s Venus

name: Vesuvius
summary: Vesuvius is a single MBF21-compatible map created in commemoration of @AD_79's birthday, based heavily upon the work they did in 2015's "Violence". Many resources from that project have been lifted wholesale, or slightly tweaked for taste. Included is a new palette by Fuzzball, music by Jimmy and AD_79, and a surprise new enemy. A sprawling reactor base featuring over 1200 monsters, all in tightly-wound and highly-calibrated setpiece encounters, along with some nasty incidental traps along the way.

name: Vertex
summary: Vertex allows the players to engage in a variety of stances and moves while having the freedom to perform acrobatics and special powers against other players.

name: Versailles Mysteries: Oscar and the Athanor
summary:
The devious Du Noï wants to find the Athanor’s secret and it’s up to you to stop him! Alchemy, cunning spies and foul treacheries will enthral you through many hours of surprising twists and turns in the court of reigning King Louis XIV.

Live the life of a 17th century gentleman using humour, logic and shrewd judgement to avoid the deadly traps of the Sun King's court in an adventure set across 25 historically accurate locations.

Meet more than 30 characters, some fun, others deadly, including Totiri the Huron, The Marquess of Armantas, Batistini the painter and Master Theodore the great alchemist.

Mini-games will teach you essential skills: learn to dance the Menuet in an historical interpretation of popular interactive dancing games, train to use a dagger and grappinou by proving your courage in a fight, and discover how to decipher fiendish enigmas.

name: Verz
summary: The game is a Virtual reality experience where the player will experience escape room styled levels. Each tier of levels will have a different theme and puzzles to be solved.

name: VeggieTales Creativity City
summary: VeggieTales Creativity City is a PC game released in 2003. Make your own invitations, thank you cards, greeting cards, stationery, e-cards and more! Design storybooks and electronic books to send to family. Create photoframes, bookmarks, notepads, coloring pages, calendars and more. Design mazes, connect-the-dots, card games, puzzles, stickers and a Pin the Tooth on Larry party game. Create an amazing "photo mosaic" of your own face, then use your imagination to create electronic posters.

name: Vegas Party
summary:
The game takes the player into the gambling-friendly universe of this over-the-top version of Las Vegas city.

Played as a race, the goal is to reach the end of the Strip before anyone else. Manage your token account in 15 gambling minigames, avoid the dangers like twisters and earthquakes, take advantage of your gaming skills and your good luck, trust no one and forget the meaning of the word “mercy” because it does not apply here!

name: Vecxis
summary: A Quake-like first-person shooter.

name: Veggie Killer
summary:
Do you know this? A vegan hippy coming up to you to tell you what to eat and what not? Even worse, all their veggies got mutated!
It's time to defend your grill and show those evil veggies what you are made of - strong manly meat.
ALL HAIL THE BACON!

name: Velocity 2X: Critical Urgency DLC Pack
summary:
So you’ve perfected the art of teleporting at high speed? Then you’re ready for the Critical Urgency Pack!

Six obsessively fine-tuned speed run levels that will push your teleporting skills beyond the limits of your imagination and into the realm of gaming magic.

Master these levels to dazzle your friends and scare your family with freakish talent.

name: Vege Bubble Shoot
summary: Pop, Match, Harvest! Dive into a vibrant veggieventure!

name: Very Hard Game
summary: Can you conquer the Very Hard Game!!! Can you keep your Sanity Intact!!! If you feel like you can then I challenge you to beat me and my masterful maze of creatures and.... walls....

name: Vending Mayhem
summary:
Imagine a world where a single penny stands against the tyranny of sugary drinks and aluminum cans. You play as our brave, pocket-sized protagonist who's tired of being jingled around in wallets, purses, and the depths of forgotten drawers. This penny is no ordinary currency; it's a fighter, and it's ready to punch its way out of a sticky situation.

The setting is within the confines of a vending machine, where rows of tantalizing canned beverages line the shelves, tempting the thirst of unsuspecting customers. Our hero despises these soda and cola cans and is determined to escape the mechanical prison. But it won't be easy – the path to freedom is filled with challenging obstacles and formidable foes.

Vending Mayhem is a humble, amateur creation that promises a simple and entertaining gaming experience. Will you conquer the vending machine's mayhem and find your way to freedom in this pixelated world?

name: Velocity 2X: Daily Sprint
summary:
Originally part of the Xbox and PC release of the game, it was planned as a DLC for PlayStation but was added as a free update after the AGDQ Speed Run of Velocity 2X.

The mode features platforming sections of the game in a randomly generated order with a practice option to see the new layout each day but only one chance to finish the level with a high score for the leaderboards.

name: VelocityLoop, Zero to Lightspeed
summary: Sci-fi outer space 3D racing game. Primarily uses keyboard for menus and game controller for game play.

name: Vegas Connection: Casino Kara Ai wo Komete
summary: Vegas Connection: Casino Kara Ai o Komete is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Graphic Research and published by Sigma Ent. Inc., which was released in Japan in 1989.

name: VelociDrone
summary: VelociDrone is a first person view multiplayer drone racing simulator. It has online leaderboards and an active community competing in drone racing tournaments.

name: Venal Soul: Chapter One
summary: An old school survival horror in First Person with limited Ammo and multiple weapons.

name: Vega Motions: Project Unleashed
summary: A 3rd person, 1 vs 1 skills-based fighting game set in a destructible arena.

name: Venturer Plug 'n' Play
summary: A dedicated console with 25 "original" games. Most of the games were usually found in other Famiclones.

name: Vestigium
summary: After having her home and garden corrupted by a mysterious dark poison, Qirie and her wisp embark on a journey to find enough magic lotus flowers in order to cleanse their place from evil. Collecting them turns out to be harder than she thought, Qirie having to solve puzzles, memorize paths and play the right cards.

name: Ven Adventure
summary: Ven Adventure is a single-player 3D platform game. You happen to meet Ven on his unknown planet, invaded by Bruce Nelson, who wants to destroy the magical world.

name: Very Important Potato
summary: A real-time steampunk strategy game were you are a potat. Potat destruction 4 styles, Plant, Mental, Energy, Insect. Gather resources, improve, defend your lab, use inventions like random gravity check, whos frying now. Place inventions in the town, for potat mayhem!

name: Vector Vaders Remix
summary: This is Vector Vaders as it was meant to be, with simpler graphics for faster and flicker free action, along with some bug fixes and multi-channel sound effects!

name: Veriscape
summary: Veriscape is a 2D side-scroller where the map tiles are generated using music

name: Veloria: The Knot of Candles
summary: Veloria: The Knot of Candle is a new type of role-playing game that integrates puzzles, level design, visual effects, and music. A girl wakes up from a nightmare to find herself in an orphanage that had long been burned down. Pushing open the charred door, the childhood nightmare strikes again.

name: Vegas Casino
summary: Vegas Casino consists of five games: Blackjack, Slots, Roulette, Big-6 Money Wheel, and Texas Hold 'Em. The player navigates around a casino map, and selects which game on the floor they would like to play. Gameplay is rendered in 3D, and the player can choose an avatar to represent them. Once the player wins a certain amount of money, they are let into the High Stakes Lounge. Made for the Nintendo DS, the game supports Button, Microphone, and Stylus control methods.

name: Vegas Games 2000
summary:
Vegas Games 2000 is a collection of casino games. The game claims twenty five games but this total is achieved by having multiple versions of some games.

The package contains:
- Baccarat
- Big Spin Money Wheel
- Blackjack: One, Two, Four or Six decks
- Craps
- Keno
- Poker: 5 Card Draw, 5 Card Stud, 7 Card Stud, Texas Hold 'Em, Jacks or Better
- Roulette
- Slot Machines: Beyond the Stars, Easy Money, Love 2 Win, Buffet and Ancient
- Treasures
- Video Keno
- Video Poker: Tens or better, Jacks or better double down, Jacks or better high roller, Jokers Wild, Deuces Wild

Many games can be played in multiple denominations and some, such as video poker, have a double down feature.

name: Vecmania
summary:
Vecmania has the largest amount of games for a homebrew compilation for the Vectrex, with a full seven games (one hidden) and two unfinished demos, being clones of the arcade games of Tempest, Star Wars, Missile Command, Space Invaders, Eliminator, Breakout, Discs Of Tron, Asteroids and Phoenix. 
 
The games can be scrolled through at the main menu by moving the joystick or D-pad left and right and then chosen by pressing up on the joystick or D-pad. The main menu can be returned to by pressing three on the controller when the player is on an individual game's title screen (except for the demos). 
 
Games in Vecmania: 
- Star Fire Spirits 
- Repulse 
- Vector Vaders Remix 
- Patriots Remix 
- Rockaroids Remix - 3rd Rock 
- Disc Duel Demo 
- Abyss Demo

name: Vertigo
summary:
Race your Xorb through 48 challenging tracks across 9 different environments.

Wii version is balance board compatible with optional Balance Board connectivity.

name: Venus Hostage
summary: An erotic thriller themed first person shooter with some puzzles developed and published by Mirage-lab.

name: Venom Strikes Back
summary: Venom Strikes Back is a single player side scrolling, two dimensional, shoot-em-up. It is the third game to be based on the popular MASK comics, TV series, and books of the mid 1980's.

name: Vera Blanc: Supernatural Mysteries
summary: ~ Vera Blanc: Full Moon + Ghost In The Castle ~

name: Very Retrouvaille
summary: Play as a little ram named Faraday and help find her pet rabbit who ran away from home...

name: Velvet 89
summary: How did the communist regime in Czechoslovakia fall? This hidden-object game tells the story of ordinary people taking part in the peaceful demonstrations that changed the course of history. Big crowds hide those, who want to tell you why they took to the streets.

name: VekWars
summary: A sci-fi shooter with old-fashioned vector graphics designed for VR.

name: Velvet Sundown
summary: Velvet Sundown is a game that relies heavily on the co-operation of your fellow players and the text to speech function which gives each character a sense of individuality. There is no real story, though it is a good place for some banter.

name: Veiled Skies
summary: Veiled Skies is a "cloudpunk" jRPG that serves as a cornerstone for the Kuroverse, a series of games set in a vast world covering three skydoms. Takes heavy inspiration from Granblue Fantasy.

name: Veil: Tactics
summary: VEIL: Tactics is a turn-based strategy game set in an alternative world of today. Lead your squad of humans and other fantastical characters through missions to save two worlds - ours, and the world of Fantasy.

name: Verde Station
summary: Verde Station is a first-person story/experience game set on a space station. During your year long solo mission you begin to question the world around you. The game reacts in subtle ways to how you play. Aboard Verde Station, you will test your wits, question everything, and strain to keep your sanity. Welcome to solitude.

name: Velucity: O2Jam Pack 1
summary: Meet O2Jam's songs at VELUCITY. You can see about 20 selected O2Jam songs in a VELUCITY exclusive pattern.

name: Verum
summary: Verum: a thought-provoking game exploring ethical issues surrounding tech corporations and personal data usage. Embark on a journey through multiple side stories, gain diverse perspectives, and unlock multiple endings to uncover the full story. Simple yet immersive gameplay with captivating graphics

name: Verlängerung: The Game
summary: Verlängerung: The Game was a game included in the German Burger King app.

name: Venus Project
summary: Venus Project is an idol training game that uses a card and command input system. Players partake in versus-style performance battles in order to win popularity as they support the growth of their budding idols.

name: Verkehrsspiele 1
summary: The CSV Video-Traffic Games Edition of the G7000 was given to primary schools in a small region of West Germany. The package consisted of a G7000 and two special games -- Verkehrsspiele 1 and Verkehrsspiele 2 -- that were used to teach children how to behave on the street. The console set is nothing more than a repackaging of a regular Philips G7000. The package comes with a special "Video-Traffic Games" sticker affixed to the TV screen depicted by the box art. It contains a regular G7000, the two games, and some documentation. The first volume of the traffic games was also given away to members of the German Commander-ROM club as Videopac "V," and retitled Kinder im Verkehr 1 (Kids in Traffic 1). The manual claims that Videopac V was the first of a series of new learning games aimed at kids 6 to 14 years old. From this, one might surmise that "Kinder im Verkehr 2" was planned for release, but no copies have been found. In all forms, the traffic games are quite rare, with Videopac V being a bit less difficult to find than the Verkehrsspiele games.

name: Veiled Tales
summary: "Veiled Tales" is an adventure game set in Georgia's high mountain village. The story revolves around an ancient tale, guiding the main character, Demetre, through crucial decisions. Immerse yourself in a wild world of deception, where uncovering secrets and mysteries becomes a fight for life.

name: Vega Conflict
summary: Stake your claim, command your fleets, and wage epic war in space.

name: Velocity G
summary:
Velocity G is a futuristic Zero G, 360 degree tunnel racing game set in the year 2086.

Experience incredible high speed action as you race your way across exiting tracks, each with their own unique characteristics.

Play single player against AI, split-screen with up to 4 players, or offline versus ghost players from all over the world!

name: Verve
summary: Welcome to Verve. You are RT-6, a member of Liminal Leap's highly-trained professional rescuing team. You are tasked to find the location of a small group of research scientists who sent out a high-level distress call from deep within the void of Verve. Good luck, the Verve is unforgiving.

name: Veiling Mask
summary: Veiling Mask is set in a mysterious world, plagued by war and elemental storms. The kingdoms are arming themselves for battle. In these troubled times, a hero appears, who wants to keep the world together at its core.

name: Vegas Casino
summary:
Known as "Super Casino Special" in Japan, Vegas Casino is a game for up to four players via multitap comprising Baccarat, Roulette, Let It Be, Black Jack, Video Poker, Keno and Slot Machines.

It can be played in two modes, Ranking play or Free Play.

In Ranking mode the player enters a target amount to be reached and then plays against their opponents to see who can reach that amount. If a single player plays in this mode the game provides three opponents but the game caters for up to ten players with the game providing the additional AI opponents. Roulette,Video Poker, and Slot Machines in this game mode are played within a split screen.

In Free mode there are no computer opponents and the games are the same as the games played in Ranking mode though there are minor differences, such as selecting which slot machine to play, because in this mode the split screen mode is not used at all.

There are three kinds of slot machine which can be played for different stakes. Keno is the odd game here because it does not appear on the game menu, instead during any game other than Video Poker a casino hostess pops up in her own little window inviting the player to a game of Keno. If the player accepts they are shown a Keno card on which they mark their numbers after which their current game of Baccarat, Roulette or whatever resumes. A short while later the hostess window opens up again and the hostess gives the good, or more usually bad, news on how good their selections were.

name: Veggie Killer Remastered
summary: Do you know this? A vegan hippy coming up to you to tell you what to eat and what not? Even worse, all their veggies got mutated! It's time to defend your grill and show those evil veggies what you are made of - strong manly meat. ALL HAIL THE BACON!

name: Veil of Crows
summary: Veil of crows is a sandbox style real-time strategy game set in a chaotic medieval world. From violent, and overtly bloody battles, to completely destructible castles, RPG style hero development, and meaningful interactions with other factions. Trade, extort, and conquer!

name: Vectron
summary: The object of Vectron is to construct an energy base, section by section. You add each section by moving your energy block in place and filling it with an energy blast. You must protect your energy block against Hungrees, G-spheres, splits, sweeps, and prizums who can destroy it. Shoot them down with energy blasts or neutralize them with special energy from an E-Pak. Don't run out of energy or you lose an energy block. There are three energy blocks per game. When they're gone, the game is over.

name: Vertigo Void
summary: Vertigo Void is a challenging 3D puzzle-platformer which demands a keen eye and sharp memory. As a lone astronaut, walk up walls, jump across the void of space (or fall in) and teleport your way to safety or else face the Sun's wrath.

name: Veliri: Planet of Machines
summary: In this Sci-Fi RPG, you are a synthetic intelligence controlling war machines on an unknown planet. Improve your equipment, engage in battles with other players or NPCs, obtain resources and earn ratings, trade, complete tasks and find allies.

name: Vermin
summary: A narrative driven survival horror game with metroidvania elements, set in the wake of a nuclear disaster, you hunt as you struggle to quench the ever growing appetite of the your heart, in hopes of completing "The Cleanse"

name: Vermin
summary: A port of Vermin with Link as the protagonist, released in Game & Watch: The Legend of Zelda (Color Screen Series).

name: Venus the Flytrap
summary: A platformer-shooter similar to Metal Storm. A specially-designed robotic beetle is sent to take down the legions of rogue AI insects meant to terraform a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Veggies vs. Undead
summary: The zombies are on the loose, actually they are already in front of your property. The only thing between your brain and their insatiable appetite is your front lawn. Luckily you just acquired an assortment of powerfull flower seeds. Plant them fast and smart to protect your home.

name: Verde
summary: Build a small town of seedlets, mysterious seed like creatures in this cozy city builder. Build facilities, put up decorations, and help the seedlets thrive!

name: Versus
summary: Versus offers a multiplayer battle experience with your friends. Customize your character with weapons, skins, and strategic modes. Improve your soldiers, earn rewards, and compete with players worldwide for victory!

name: Very Scary Eatery
summary: A VERY short and VERY scary horror game made for the two minute horror game-jam. Hope you enjoy it.)

name: Vecitas
summary: Vecitas is a fast paced multiplayer space shooter combined with singleplayer mode. Have fun playing with others in space combat. Unlock new ships playing in multiplayer as well as singleplayer. The Galaxy of Vecitas awaits you!

name: Very Bad Dreams
summary: Very Bad Dreams is an intense and demanding experience that will test your nerves. Forget everything you thought you knew about horror games, because Very Bad Dreams transcends the boundaries of the gaming experience. Developed by an independent French studio, it's much more than just a game.

name: Veil of Dust: A Homesteading Game
summary: A story-driven Survival/ Farm RPG about learning to live after loss. Farm, Forage, Hunt & Craft (on casual or challenge mode) to survive in the deserts of 1860's Oregon. Talk to NPCs & deepen your relationships, upgrade the homestead & explore while you unravel a story about love & tenacity.

name: Vectradius
summary: Vectradius is a fast paced, circle based shooter! Tilt to swing your ship around the edge of the circle while blasting Vectovillians back to the 1980's! Avoid your enemies as they cross the edge of the circle, while using bombs and lasers to get through goals, increase score multipliers, and get power-ups!

name: Venture
summary: In Venture you control the adventurer Winky who sets out to collect treasure. You start out on an overview map of a dungeon which shows several rooms containing treasure. Since you cannot kill any enemies while rummaging through the dungeon corridors you have to dodge them on your way to the treasure rooms since they will kill you instantly. After entering one of the rooms you are able to fight the various monsters lurking in the rooms while you collect the treasure. Be careful not to linger to long in the treasure rooms because an "Evil Otto" like monster will appear which is invincible and will hunt you down until you leave the room again. After having collected every treasure in every room of a dungeon you move on to the next dungeon.

name: Veggie Quest: The Puzzle Game
summary: Become a Game Designer in this open-ended puzzle game. Design game dungeons and watch AI-controlled players beat them. Explore how simple movement rules result in mind-bending dungeon layouts.

name: Venus Puzzles
summary: Come explore a unique world of beautiful women, unleash your puzzle solving skills, collect the most fascinating artworks, and enjoy endless enjoyment.

name: Velocity Vortex
summary: Velocity Vortex is a challenging fast pased Time Attack Platformer where you only have 5 seconds to finish each level. As you go through the levels the game gets faster, and as you die the game gets slower.

name: Versus Purgatory
summary: Versus Purgatory is a micro-roguelike shoot-em-up with mind-bending gameplay inwhich you delve into a dungeon, controlling two characters at the same time.

name: Vegan Challenge
summary: Action, 2D platform game. You start the game with an overweight character. The evil meat enemies, traps and minigames want to stop you. The ultimate goal lose weight and get fitter. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Versebound
summary: Slay hordes of enemies and fight mythical bosses in this challenging action roguelike. In a desperate fight for survival you must perform rituals, buildcraft and learn from every misstep to become stronger. Use unique abilities and powerful artifacts to beat every trial in the world of Kalevala!
